3487  l->push_back(scriptTrigger->GetVehicle()->GetBase());

3489  case SMART_TARGET_INVOKER_PARTY:
3490  if (scriptTrigger)
3491  {
3492  if (Player* player = scriptTrigger->ToPlayer())
3493  {
3494  if (Group* group = player->GetGroup())
3495  {
3496  for (GroupReference* groupRef = group->GetFirstMember(); groupRef != nullptr; groupRef = groupRef->next())
3497  if (Player* member = groupRef->GetSource())
3498  if (member->IsInMap(player))
3499  l->push_back(member);
3500  }
3501  // We still add the player to the list if there is no group. If we do
3502  // this even if there is a group (thus the else-check), it will add the
3503  // same player to the list twice. We don't want that to happen.
3504  else
3505  l->push_back(scriptTrigger);
3506  }
3507  }
3508  break;
3509  case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
3510  {
3511  // will always return a valid pointer, even if empty list
3512  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist((float)e.target.unitRange.maxDist);
3513  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = units->begin(); itr != units->end(); ++itr)
3514  {
3515  if (!IsCreature(*itr))
3516  continue;
3517 
3518  if (me && me->GetGUID() == (*itr)->GetGUID())
3519  continue;
3520 
3521  // check alive state - 1 alive, 2 dead, 0 both
3522  if (uint32 state = e.target.unitRange.livingState)
3523  {
3524  if ((*itr)->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 2)
3525  continue;
3526  if (!(*itr)->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
3527  continue;
3528  }
3529 
3530  if (((e.target.unitRange.creature && (*itr)->ToCreature()->GetEntry() == e.target.unitRange.creature) || !e.target.unitRange.creature) && baseObject->IsInRange(*itr, (float)e.target.unitRange.minDist, (float)e.target.unitRange.maxDist))
3531  l->push_back(*itr);
3532  }
3533 
3534  delete units;
3535  break;
3536  }
3537  case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
3538  {
3539  // will always return a valid pointer, even if empty list
3540  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist((float)e.target.unitDistance.dist);
3541  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = units->begin(); itr != units->end(); ++itr)
3542  {
3543  if (!IsCreature(*itr))
3544  continue;
3545 
3546  if (me && me->GetGUID() == (*itr)->GetGUID())
3547  continue;

3551  {

3553  continue;
3554  if (!(*itr)->ToCreature()->IsAlive() && state == 1)
3555  continue;

3557

3601  break;

3604  {

3608  break;
3609  }
3610 
3611  Creature* target = FindCreatureNear(scriptTrigger ? scriptTrigger : GetBaseObject(), e.target.unitGUID.dbGuid);
3612  if (target && (!e.target.unitGUID.entry || target->GetEntry() == e.target.unitGUID.entry))
3613  l->push_back(target);
3614  break;
3615  }

3621  break;

3626  l->push_back(target);
3627  break;
3628  }
3629  case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
3630  {
3631  // will always return a valid pointer, even if empty list
3632  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist((float)e.target.playerRange.maxDist);
3633  if (!units->empty() && GetBaseObject())
3634  {
3635  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = units->begin(); itr != units->end(); ++itr)
3636  if (IsPlayer(*itr) && GetBaseObject()->IsInRange(*itr, (float)e.target.playerRange.minDist, (float)e.target.playerRange.maxDist) && (*itr)->ToPlayer()->IsAlive() && !(*itr)->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
3637  l->push_back(*itr);
3638 
3639  // If Orientation is also set and we didnt find targets, try it with all the range
3640  if (l->empty() && e.target.o > 0)
3641  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = units->begin(); itr != units->end(); ++itr)
3642  if (IsPlayer(*itr) && baseObject->IsInRange(*itr, 0.0f, float(e.target.playerRange.maxDist)) && (*itr)->ToPlayer()->IsAlive() && !(*itr)->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
3643  l->push_back(*itr);
3644 
3645  if (e.target.playerRange.maxCount > 0)
3646  Acore::Containers::RandomResize(*l, e.target.playerRange.maxCount);
3647  }
3648 
3649  delete units;
3650  break;
3651  }
3652  case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
3653  {

3669  l->assign(objectList->begin(), objectList->end());
3670  }
3671

3673  break;
3674  }
3675  case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
3676  {
3677  Creature* target = GetClosestCreatureWithEntry(GetBaseObject(), e.target.closest.entry, (float)(e.target.closest.dist ? e.target.closest.dist : 100), !e.target.closest.dead);
3678  if (target)
3679  l->push_back(target);
3680  break;
3681  }
3682  case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT:
3683  {
3684  GameObject* target = GetClosestGameObjectWithEntry(GetBaseObject(), e.target.closestGameobject.entry, (float)(e.target.closestGameobject.dist ? e.target.closestGameobject.dist : 100), e.target.closestGameobject.onlySpawned);

3686  l->push_back(target);
3687  break;
3688  }
3689  case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
3690  {
3691  if (WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject())
3692  {
3693  Player* target = obj->SelectNearestPlayer((float)e.target.playerDistance.dist);
3694  if (target)
3695  l->push_back(target);
3696  }
3697  break;
3698  }
3699  case SMART_TARGET_OWNER_OR_SUMMONER:
3700  {
3701  if (me)
3702  {
3703  if (Unit* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, me->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3704  l->push_back(owner);
3705  // Xinef: dont add same unit twice
3706  else if (me->IsSummon() && me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit())
3707  l->push_back(me->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerUnit());
3708  }
3709  else if (go)
3710  {
3711  if (Unit* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*go, go->GetOwnerGUID()))
3712  l->push_back(owner);
3713  }
3714 
3715  // xinef: Get owner of owner
3716  if (e.target.owner.useCharmerOrOwner && !l->empty())
3717  {
3718  Unit* owner = l->front()->ToUnit();
3719  l->clear();
3720 
3721  if (Unit* base = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*owner, owner->GetCharmerOrOwnerGUID()))
3722  l->push_back(base);
3723  }
3724  break;
3725  }
3726  case SMART_TARGET_THREAT_LIST:
3727  {
3728  if (me)
3729  {
3730  ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->getThreatMgr().getThreatList();
3731  for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
3732  if (Unit* temp = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
3733  // Xinef: added distance check
3734  if (e.target.hostilRandom.maxDist == 0 || me->IsWithinCombatRange(temp, (float)e.target.hostilRandom.maxDist))
3735  l->push_back(temp);
3736  }
3737  break;
3738  }
3739  case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_ENEMY:
3740  {
3741  if (me)
3742  if (Unit* target = me->SelectNearestTarget(e.target.closestAttackable.maxDist, e.target.closestAttackable.playerOnly))
3743  l->push_back(target);
3744 
3745  break;
3746  }
3747  case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_FRIENDLY:
3748  {
3749  if (me)
3750  if (Unit* target = DoFindClosestFriendlyInRange(e.target.closestFriendly.maxDist, e.target.closestFriendly.playerOnly))
3751  l->push_back(target);
3752 
3753  break;
3754  }
3755  case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_WITH_AURA:
3756  {
3757  // will always return a valid pointer, even if empty list
3758  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist(e.target.z ? e.target.z : float(e.target.playerWithAura.distMax));
3759  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = units->begin(); itr != units->end(); ++itr)
3760  if (IsPlayer(*itr) && (*itr)->ToPlayer()->IsAlive() && !(*itr)->ToPlayer()->IsGameMaster())
3761  if (GetBaseObject()->IsInRange(*itr, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMin, (float)e.target.playerWithAura.distMax))
3762  if (bool(e.target.playerWithAura.negation) != (*itr)->ToPlayer()->HasAura(e.target.playerWithAura.spellId))
3763  l->push_back(*itr);
3764 
3765  if (e.target.o > 0)
3766  Acore::Containers::RandomResize(*l, e.target.o);
3767 
3768  delete units;
3769  break;
3770  }
3771  case SMART_TARGET_ROLE_SELECTION:
3772  {
3773  // will always return a valid pointer, even if empty list
3774  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist(float(e.target.roleSelection.maxDist));
3775  // 1 = Tanks, 2 = Healer, 4 = Damage
3776  uint32 roleMask = e.target.roleSelection.roleMask;
3777  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = units->begin(); itr != units->end(); ++itr)
3778  if (Player* targetPlayer = (*itr)->ToPlayer())
3779  if (targetPlayer->IsAlive() && !targetPlayer->IsGameMaster())
3780  {
3781  if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_TANKS)
3782  {
3783  if (targetPlayer->HasTankSpec())
3784  {
3785  l->push_back(*itr);
3786  continue;
3787  }
3788  }
3789  if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_HEALERS)
3790  {
3791  if (targetPlayer->HasHealSpec())
3792  {
3793  l->push_back(*itr);
3794  continue;
3795  }
3796  }
3797  if (roleMask & SMART_TARGET_ROLE_FLAG_DAMAGERS)
3798  {
3799  if (targetPlayer->HasCasterSpec() || targetPlayer->HasMeleeSpec())
3800  {
3801  l->push_back(*itr);
3802  continue;
3803  }
3804  }
3805  }
3806 
3807  if (e.target.roleSelection.resize > 0)
3808  Acore::Containers::RandomResize(*l, e.target.roleSelection.resize);
3809 
3810  delete units;
3811  break;
3812  }
3813  case SMART_TARGET_VEHICLE_PASSENGER:
3814  {
3815  if (me && me->IsVehicle())
3816  {
3817  if (Unit* target = me->GetVehicleKit()->GetPassenger(e.target.vehicle.seat))
3818  {
3819  l->push_back(target);
3820  }
3821  }
3822  break;
3823  }
3824  case SMART_TARGET_NONE:
3825  case SMART_TARGET_POSITION:
3826  default:
3827  break;
3828  }
3829 
3830  if (l->empty())
3831  {
3832  delete l;
3833  l = nullptr;
3834  }
3835 
3836  return l;
3837 }
uint32
std::uint32_t uint32

4749  {

4753  maxDisableDist = i->event.minMaxRepeat.max;
4754  }

4761  float maxRange = spellInfo->GetMaxRange(spellInfo->IsPositive());
4762  float minRange = spellInfo->GetMinRange(spellInfo->IsPositive());
4763 
4764  if (maxRange > 0 && minRange <= maxRange)
4765  {
4766  smartCasterMaxDist = minRange + ((maxRange - minRange) * 0.65f);
4767  smartCasterPowerType = (Powers)spellInfo->PowerType;
4768  }
4769  }
4770  }

void SmartScript::OnUpdate ( const uint32  diff)

4589  if ((mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_CREATURE || mScriptType == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT) && !GetBaseObject())

4603  UpdateTimer(*icurr, diff);

4641  mTextTimer = 0;

◆ ProcessAction()

void SmartScript::ProcessAction ( SmartScriptHolder &  e,
Unit *  unit = nullptr,
uint32  var0 = 0,
uint32  var1 = 0,
bool  bvar = false,
const SpellInfo *  spell = nullptr,

)

Definition at line 119 of file SmartScript.cpp.

120 {
121  //calc random
122  if (e.GetEventType() != SMART_EVENT_LINK && e.event.event_chance < 100 && e.event.event_chance)
123  {
124  uint32 rnd = urand(0, 100);
125  if (e.event.event_chance <= rnd)
126  return;
127  }
128  e.runOnce = true;//used for repeat check
129 
130  if (unit)
131  mLastInvoker = unit->GetGUID();
132 
133  if (Unit* tempInvoker = GetLastInvoker())
134  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Invoker: %s (%s)", tempInvoker->GetName().c_str(), tempInvoker->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
135 
136  bool isControlled = e.action.MoveToPos.controlled > 0;
137 
138  switch (e.GetActionType())
139  {
140  case SMART_ACTION_TALK:
141  {
142  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
143  Creature* talker = e.target.type == 0 ? me : nullptr;
144  Unit* talkTarget = nullptr;
145  if (targets)
146  {
147  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
148  {
149  if (IsCreature((*itr)) && !(*itr)->ToCreature()->IsPet()) // Prevented sending text to pets.
150  {
151  if (e.action.talk.useTalkTarget)
152  {
153  talker = me;
154  talkTarget = (*itr)->ToCreature();
155  }
156  else
157  talker = (*itr)->ToCreature();
158  break;
159  }
160  else if (IsPlayer((*itr)))
161  {
162  talker = me; // xinef: added
163  talkTarget = (*itr)->ToPlayer();
164  break;
165  }
166  }
167 
168  delete targets;
169  }
170 
171  if (!talkTarget)
172  talkTarget = GetLastInvoker();
173 
174  if (!talker)
175  break;
176 
177  if (!sCreatureTextMgr->TextExist(talker->GetEntry(), uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID)))
178  {
179  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_TALK: EntryOrGuid %d SourceType %u EventType %u TargetType %u using non-existent Text id %u for talker %u, ignored.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetTargetType(), e.action.talk.textGroupID, talker->GetEntry());
180  break;
181  }
182 
183  mTalkerEntry = talker->GetEntry();
184  mLastTextID = e.action.talk.textGroupID;
185  mTextTimer = e.action.talk.duration;
186  mUseTextTimer = true;
187  sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(talker, uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID), talkTarget);
188  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_TALK: talker: %s (%s), textId: %u", talker->GetName().c_str(), talker->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), mLastTextID);
189  break;
190  }
191  case SMART_ACTION_SIMPLE_TALK:
192  {
193  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
194  if (targets)
195  {
196  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
197  {
198  if (IsCreature(*itr))
199  sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat((*itr)->ToCreature(), uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID), IsPlayer(GetLastInvoker()) ? GetLastInvoker() : 0);
200  else if (IsPlayer(*itr) && me)
201  {
202  Unit* templastInvoker = GetLastInvoker();
203  sCreatureTextMgr->SendChat(me, uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID), IsPlayer(templastInvoker) ? templastInvoker : 0, CHAT_MSG_ADDON, LANG_ADDON, TEXT_RANGE_NORMAL, 0, TEAM_NEUTRAL, false, (*itr)->ToPlayer());
204  }
205  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SIMPLE_TALK: talker: %s (%s), textGroupId: %u",
206  (*itr)->GetName().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), uint8(e.action.talk.textGroupID));
207  }
208 
209  delete targets;
210  }
211  break;
212  }
213  case SMART_ACTION_PLAY_EMOTE:
214  {
215  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
216  if (targets)
217  {
218  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
219  {
220  if (IsUnit(*itr))
221  {
222  (*itr)->ToUnit()->HandleEmoteCommand(e.action.emote.emote);
223  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_PLAY_EMOTE: target: %s (%s), emote: %u",
224  (*itr)->GetName().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.emote.emote);
225  }
226  }
227 
228  delete targets;
229  }
230  break;
231  }
232  case SMART_ACTION_SOUND:
233  {
234  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
235  if (targets)
236  {
237  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
238  {
239  if (IsUnit(*itr))
240  {
241  (*itr)->PlayDirectSound(e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf ? (*itr)->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
242  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SOUND: target: %s (%s), sound: %u, onlyself: %u",
243  (*itr)->GetName().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.sound.sound, e.action.sound.onlySelf);
244  }
245  }
246 
247  delete targets;
248  }
249  break;
250  }
251  case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_SOUND:
252  {
253  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
254  if (!targets)
255  break;
256 
257  uint32 sounds[4];
258  sounds[0] = e.action.randomSound.sound1;
259  sounds[1] = e.action.randomSound.sound2;
260  sounds[2] = e.action.randomSound.sound3;
261  sounds[3] = e.action.randomSound.sound4;
262  uint32 temp[4];
263  uint32 count = 0;
264  for (uint8 i = 0; i < 4; i++)
265  {
266  if (sounds[i])
267  {
268  temp[count] = sounds[i];
269  ++count;
270  }
271  }
272 
273  if (count == 0)
274  {
275  delete targets;
276  break;
277  }
278 
279  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
280  {
281  if (IsUnit(*itr))
282  {
283  uint32 sound = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
284  (*itr)->PlayDirectSound(sound, e.action.randomSound.onlySelf ? (*itr)->ToPlayer() : nullptr);
285  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_SOUND: target: %s (%s), sound: %u, onlyself: %u",
286  (*itr)->GetName().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), sound, e.action.randomSound.onlySelf);
287  }
288  }
289 
290  delete targets;
291  break;
292  }
293  case SMART_ACTION_MUSIC:
294  {
295  ObjectList* targets = nullptr;
296 
297  if (e.action.music.type > 0)
298  {
299  if (me && me->FindMap())
300  {
301  Map::PlayerList const& players = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
302  targets = new ObjectList();
303 
304  if (!players.isEmpty())
305  {
306  for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = players.begin(); i != players.end(); ++i)
307  if (Player* player = i->GetSource())
308  {
309  if (player->GetZoneId() == me->GetZoneId())
310  {
311  if (e.action.music.type > 1)
312  {
313  if (player->GetAreaId() == me->GetAreaId())
314  targets->push_back(player);
315  }
316  else
317  targets->push_back(player);
318  }
319  }
320  }
321  }
322  }
323  else
324  targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
325 
326  if (targets)
327  {
328  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
329  {
330  if (IsUnit(*itr))
331  {
332  (*itr)->SendPlayMusic(e.action.music.sound, e.action.music.onlySelf > 0);
333  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MUSIC: target: %s (%s), sound: %u, onlySelf: %u, type: %u",
334  (*itr)->GetName().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.music.sound, e.action.music.onlySelf, e.action.music.type);
335  }
336  }
337 
338  delete targets;
339  }
340  break;
341  }
342  case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MUSIC:
343  {
344  ObjectList* targets = nullptr;
345 
346  if (e.action.randomMusic.type > 0)
347  {
348  if (me && me->FindMap())
349  {
350  Map::PlayerList const& players = me->GetMap()->GetPlayers();
351  targets = new ObjectList();
352 
353  if (!players.isEmpty())
354  {
355  for (Map::PlayerList::const_iterator i = players.begin(); i != players.end(); ++i)
356  if (Player* player = i->GetSource())
357  {
358  if (player->GetZoneId() == me->GetZoneId())
359  {
360  if (e.action.randomMusic.type > 1)
361  {
362  if (player->GetAreaId() == me->GetAreaId())
363  targets->push_back(player);
364  }
365  else
366  targets->push_back(player);
367  }
368  }
369  }
370  }
371  }
372  else
373  targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
374 
375  if (!targets)
376  break;
377 
378  uint32 sounds[4];
379  sounds[0] = e.action.randomMusic.sound1;
380  sounds[1] = e.action.randomMusic.sound2;
381  sounds[2] = e.action.randomMusic.sound3;
382  sounds[3] = e.action.randomMusic.sound4;
383  uint32 temp[4];
384  uint32 count = 0;
385  for (uint8 i = 0; i < 4; i++)
386  {
387  if (sounds[i])
388  {
389  temp[count] = sounds[i];
390  ++count;
391  }
392  }
393 
394  if (count == 0)
395  {
396  delete targets;
397  break;
398  }
399 
400  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
401  {
402  if (IsUnit(*itr))
403  {
404  uint32 sound = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
405  (*itr)->SendPlayMusic(sound, e.action.randomMusic.onlySelf > 0);
406  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MUSIC: target: %s (%s), sound: %u, onlyself: %u, type: %u",
407  (*itr)->GetName().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), sound, e.action.randomMusic.onlySelf, e.action.randomMusic.type);
408  }
409  }
410 
411  delete targets;
412  break;
413  }
414  case SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION:
415  {
416  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
417  if (targets)
418  {
419  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
420  {
421  if (IsCreature(*itr))
422  {
423  if (e.action.faction.factionID)
424  {
425  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetFaction(e.action.faction.factionID);
426  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION: Creature entry %u (%s) set faction to %u",
427  (*itr)->GetEntry(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.faction.factionID);
428  }
429  else
430  {
431  if (CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate((*itr)->ToCreature()->GetEntry()))
432  {
433  if ((*itr)->ToCreature()->GetFaction() != ci->faction)
434  {
435  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetFaction(ci->faction);
436  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_FACTION: Creature entry %u (%s) set faction to %u",
437  (*itr)->GetEntry(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), ci->faction);
438  }
439  }
440  }
441  }
442  }
443 
444  delete targets;
445  }
446  break;
447  }
448  case SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL:
449  {
450  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
451  if (!targets)
452  break;
453 
454  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
455  {
456  if (!IsCreature(*itr))
457  continue;
458 
459  if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature || e.action.morphOrMount.model)
460  {
461  //set model based on entry from creature_template
462  if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature)
463  {
464  if (CreatureTemplate const* ci = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(e.action.morphOrMount.creature))
465  {
466  uint32 displayId = ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(ci);
467  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetDisplayId(displayId);
468  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry %u (%s) set displayid to %u",
469  (*itr)->GetEntry(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), displayId);
470  }
471  }
472  //if no param1, then use value from param2 (modelId)
473  else
474  {
475  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetDisplayId(e.action.morphOrMount.model);
476  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry %u (%s) set displayid to %u",
477  (*itr)->GetEntry(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.morphOrMount.model);
478  }
479  }
480  else
481  {
482  (*itr)->ToCreature()->DeMorph();
483  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_MORPH_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL: Creature entry %u (%s) demorphs.",
484  (*itr)->GetEntry(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
485  }
486  }
487 
488  delete targets;
489  break;
490  }
491  case SMART_ACTION_FAIL_QUEST:
492  {
493  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
494  if (!targets)
495  break;
496 
497  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
498  {
499  if (IsPlayer(*itr))
500  {
501  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->FailQuest(e.action.quest.quest);
502  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_FAIL_QUEST: Player %s fails quest %u",
503  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.quest.quest);
504  }
505  }
506 
507  delete targets;
508  break;
509  }
510  case SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST:
511  {
512  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
513  if (!targets)
514  break;
515 
516  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
517  {
518  if (Player* pTarget = (*itr)->ToPlayer())
519  {
520  if (Quest const* q = sObjectMgr->GetQuestTemplate(e.action.questOffer.questID))
521  {
522  if (me && e.action.questOffer.directAdd == 0)
523  {
524  if (pTarget->CanTakeQuest(q, true))
525  if (WorldSession* session = pTarget->GetSession())
526  {
527  PlayerMenu menu(session);
528  menu.SendQuestGiverQuestDetails(q, me->GetGUID(), true);
529  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST: Player %s- offering quest %u",
530  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.questOffer.questID);
531  }
532  }
533  else
534  {
535  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->AddQuestAndCheckCompletion(q, nullptr);
536  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_OFFER_QUEST: Player %s - quest %u added",
537  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.questOffer.questID);
538  }
539  }
540  }
541  }
542 
543  delete targets;
544  break;
545  }
546  case SMART_ACTION_SET_REACT_STATE:
547  {
548  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
549  if (!targets)
550  break;
551 
552  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
553  {
554  if (!IsCreature(*itr))
555  continue;
556 
557  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetReactState(ReactStates(e.action.react.state));
558  }
559 
560  delete targets;
561  break;
562  }
563  case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_EMOTE:
564  {
565  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
566  if (!targets)
567  break;
568 
569  uint32 emotes[SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT];
570  emotes[0] = e.action.randomEmote.emote1;
571  emotes[1] = e.action.randomEmote.emote2;
572  emotes[2] = e.action.randomEmote.emote3;
573  emotes[3] = e.action.randomEmote.emote4;
574  emotes[4] = e.action.randomEmote.emote5;
575  emotes[5] = e.action.randomEmote.emote6;
576  uint32 temp[SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT];
577  uint32 count = 0;
578  for (uint8 i = 0; i < SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT; i++)
579  {
580  if (emotes[i])
581  {
582  temp[count] = emotes[i];
583  ++count;
584  }
585  }
586 
587  if (count == 0)
588  {
589  delete targets;
590  break;
591  }
592 
593  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
594  {
595  if (IsUnit(*itr))
596  {
597  uint32 emote = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
598  (*itr)->ToUnit()->HandleEmoteCommand(emote);
599  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_EMOTE: Creature %s handle random emote %u",
600  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), emote);
601  }
602  }
603 
604  delete targets;
605  break;
606  }
607  case SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT:
608  {
609  if (!me)
610  break;
611 
612  ThreatContainer::StorageType threatList = me->getThreatMgr().getThreatList();
613  for (ThreatContainer::StorageType::const_iterator i = threatList.begin(); i != threatList.end(); ++i)
614  {
615  if (Unit* target = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*me, (*i)->getUnitGuid()))
616  {
617  me->getThreatMgr().modifyThreatPercent(target, e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
618  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_ALL_PCT: Creature %s modify threat for unit %s, value %i",
619  me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), target->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
620  }
621  }
622  break;
623  }
624  case SMART_ACTION_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT:
625  {
626  if (!me)
627  break;
628 
629  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
630  if (!targets)
631  break;
632 
633  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
634  {
635  if (IsUnit(*itr))
636  {
637  me->getThreatMgr().modifyThreatPercent((*itr)->ToUnit(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
638  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_THREAT_SINGLE_PCT: Creature %s modify threat for unit %s, value %i",
639  me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.threatPCT.threatINC ? (int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC : -(int32)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
640  }
641  }
642 
643  delete targets;
644  break;
645  }
646  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_AREAEXPLOREDOREVENTHAPPENS:
647  {
648  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
649  if (!targets)
650  break;
651 
652  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
653  {
654  // Special handling for vehicles
655  if (IsUnit(*itr))
656  {
657  if (Vehicle* vehicle = (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetVehicleKit())
658  for (SeatMap::iterator it = vehicle->Seats.begin(); it != vehicle->Seats.end(); ++it)
659  if (Player* player = ObjectAccessor::GetPlayer(*(*itr), it->second.Passenger.Guid))
660  player->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest);
661 
662  if (Player* player = (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
663  {
664  player->GroupEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest, GetBaseObject());
665  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_CALL_AREAEXPLOREDOREVENTHAPPENS: Player %s credited quest %u",
666  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.quest.quest);
667  }
668  }
669  }
670 
671  delete targets;
672  break;
673  }
674  case SMART_ACTION_CAST:
675  {
676  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
677  if (!targets)
678  break;
679 
680  Unit* caster = me;
681  // Areatrigger Cast!
682  if (e.GetScriptType() == SMART_SCRIPT_TYPE_AREATRIGGER)
683  caster = unit->SummonTrigger(unit->GetPositionX(), unit->GetPositionY(), unit->GetPositionZ(), unit->GetOrientation(), 5000);
684 
685  if (e.action.cast.targetsLimit > 0 && targets->size() > e.action.cast.targetsLimit)
686  Acore::Containers::RandomResize(*targets, e.action.cast.targetsLimit);
687 
688  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
689  {
690  if (go)
691  {
692  // Xinef: may be nullptr!
693  go->CastSpell((*itr)->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell);
694  }
695 
696  if (!IsUnit(*itr))
697  continue;
698 
699  if (caster && caster != me) // Areatrigger cast
700  {
701  caster->CastSpell((*itr)->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
702  }
703  else if (me && (!(e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !(*itr)->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell)))
704  {
705  if (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
706  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
707 
708  // Xinef: flag usable only if caster has max dist set
709  if ((e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE) && GetCasterMaxDist() > 0.0f && me->GetMaxPower(GetCasterPowerType()) > 0)
710  {
711  // Xinef: check mana case only and operate movement accordingly, LoS and range is checked in targetet movement generator
712  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(e.action.cast.spell);
713  int32 currentPower = me->GetPower(GetCasterPowerType());
714 
715  if ((spellInfo && (currentPower < spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(me, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()) || me->IsSpellProhibited(spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))) || me->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
716  {
717  SetCasterActualDist(0);
718  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetForcedCombatMove(0);
719  }
720  else if (GetCasterActualDist() == 0.0f && me->GetPowerPct(GetCasterPowerType()) > 30.0f)
721  {
722  RestoreCasterMaxDist();
723  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetForcedCombatMove(GetCasterActualDist());
724  }
725  }
726 
727  me->CastSpell((*itr)->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
728  }
729  }
730 
731  delete targets;
732  break;
733  }
734  case SMART_ACTION_INVOKER_CAST:
735  {
736  Unit* tempLastInvoker = GetLastInvoker(unit); // xinef: can be used for area triggers cast
737  if (!tempLastInvoker)
738  break;
739 
740  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
741  if (!targets)
742  break;
743 
744  if (e.action.cast.targetsLimit > 0 && targets->size() > e.action.cast.targetsLimit)
745  Acore::Containers::RandomResize(*targets, e.action.cast.targetsLimit);
746 
747  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
748  {
749  if (!IsUnit(*itr))
750  continue;
751 
752  if (!(e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !(*itr)->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell))
753  {
754  if (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
755  tempLastInvoker->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
756 
757  tempLastInvoker->CastSpell((*itr)->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
758  }
759  }
760 
761  delete targets;
762  break;
763  }
764  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_AURA:
765  {
766  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
767  if (!targets)
768  break;
769 
770  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
771  {
772  if (IsUnit(*itr))
773  {
774  (*itr)->ToUnit()->AddAura(e.action.cast.spell, (*itr)->ToUnit());
775  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ADD_AURA: Adding aura %u to unit %s",
776  e.action.cast.spell, (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
777  }
778  }
779 
780  delete targets;
781  break;
782  }
783  case SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_GOBJECT:
784  {
785  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
786  if (!targets)
787  break;
788 
789  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
790  {
791  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
792  {
793  // Activate
794  // xinef: wtf is this shit?
795  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SetLootState(GO_READY);
796  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->UseDoorOrButton(0, !!e.action.activateObject.alternative, unit);
797  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_GOBJECT. Gameobject %s activated",
798  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
799  }
800  }
801 
802  delete targets;
803  break;
804  }
805  case SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT:
806  {
807  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
808  if (!targets)
809  break;
810 
811  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
812  {
813  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
814  {
815  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->ResetDoorOrButton();
816  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_RESET_GOBJECT. Gameobject %s reset",
817  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
818  }
819  }
820 
821  delete targets;
822  break;
823  }
824  case SMART_ACTION_SET_EMOTE_STATE:
825  {
826  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
827  if (!targets)
828  break;
829 
830  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
831  {
832  if (IsUnit(*itr))
833  {
834  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_EMOTESTATE, e.action.emote.emote);
835  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_EMOTE_STATE. Unit %s set emotestate to %u",
836  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.emote.emote);
837  }
838  }
839 
840  delete targets;
841  break;
842  }
843  case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG:
844  {
845  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
846  if (!targets)
847  break;
848 
849  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
850  {
851  if (IsUnit(*itr))
852  {
853  if (!e.action.unitFlag.type)
854  {
855  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
856  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG. Unit %s added flag %u to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS",
857  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
858  }
859  else
860  {
861  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
862  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FLAG. Unit %s added flag %u to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2",
863  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
864  }
865  }
866  }
867 
868  delete targets;
869  break;
870  }
871  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG:
872  {
873  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
874  if (!targets)
875  break;
876 
877  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
878  {
879  if (IsUnit(*itr))
880  {
881  if (!e.action.unitFlag.type)
882  {
883  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
884  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG. Unit %s removed flag %u to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS",
885  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
886  }
887  else
888  {
889  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
890  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FLAG. Unit %s removed flag %u to UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2",
891  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.unitFlag.flag);
892  }
893  }
894  }
895 
896  delete targets;
897  break;
898  }
899  case SMART_ACTION_AUTO_ATTACK:
900  {
901  if (!IsSmart())
902  break;
903 
904  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetAutoAttack(e.action.autoAttack.attack);
905  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_AUTO_ATTACK: Creature: %s bool on = %u",
906  me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.autoAttack.attack);
907  break;
908  }
909  case SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT:
910  {
911  if (!IsSmart())
912  break;
913 
914  // Xinef: Fix Combat Movement
915  bool move = e.action.combatMove.move;
916  if (move && GetMaxCombatDist() && e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_MANA_PCT)
917  {
918  SetActualCombatDist(0);
919  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetForcedCombatMove(0);
920  }
921  else
922  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(move);
923  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_ALLOW_COMBAT_MOVEMENT: Creature %s bool on = %u",
924  me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.combatMove.move);
925  break;
926  }
927  case SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE:
928  {
929  if (!GetBaseObject())
930  break;
931 
932  SetPhase(e.action.setEventPhase.phase);
933  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_PHASE: Creature %s set event phase %u",
934  GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.setEventPhase.phase);
935  break;
936  }
937  case SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE:
938  {
939  if (!GetBaseObject())
940  break;
941 
942  IncPhase(e.action.incEventPhase.inc);
943  DecPhase(e.action.incEventPhase.dec);
944  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_INC_EVENT_PHASE: Creature %s inc event phase by %u, "
945  "decrease by %u", GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.incEventPhase.inc, e.action.incEventPhase.dec);
946  break;
947  }
948  case SMART_ACTION_EVADE:
949  {
950  if (!GetBaseObject())
951  break;
952 
953  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
954  if (!targets)
955  break;
956 
957  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
958  if (IsCreature((*itr)))
959  if ((*itr)->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled)
960  (*itr)->ToCreature()->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
961 
962  delete targets;
963  break;
964  }
965  case SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST:
966  {
967  // Xinef: do not allow to flee without control (stun, fear etc)
968  if (!me || me->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_LOST_CONTROL) || me->GetSpeed(MOVE_RUN) < 0.1f)
969  break;
970 
971  me->DoFleeToGetAssistance();
972  if (e.action.flee.withEmote)
973  {
974  Acore::BroadcastTextBuilder builder(me, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE, BROADCAST_TEXT_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST, me->getGender());
975  sCreatureTextMgr->SendChatPacket(me, builder, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE);
976  }
977  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_FLEE_FOR_ASSIST: Creature %s DoFleeToGetAssistance", me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
978  break;
979  }
980  case SMART_ACTION_COMBAT_STOP:
981  {
982  if (!me)
983  break;
984 
985  me->CombatStop(true);
986  break;
987  }
988  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS:
989  {
990  if (!GetBaseObject())
991  break;
992 
993  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
994  if (!targets)
995  break;
996 
997  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
998  {
999  if (IsUnit((*itr)))
1000  {
1001  if (Player* player = (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
1002  player->GroupEventHappens(e.action.quest.quest, GetBaseObject());
1003  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_GROUPEVENTHAPPENS: Player %s, group credit for quest %u",
1004  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.quest.quest);
1005  }
1006  }
1007 
1008  delete targets;
1009  break;
1010  }
1011  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL:
1012  {
1013  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1014  if (!targets)
1015  break;
1016 
1017  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1018  {
1019  if (!IsUnit((*itr)))
1020  continue;
1021 
1022  if (e.action.removeAura.spell)
1023  {
1024  if (e.action.removeAura.charges)
1025  {
1026  if (Aura* aur = (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetAura(e.action.removeAura.spell))
1027  aur->ModCharges(-static_cast<int32>(e.action.removeAura.charges), AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE);
1028  }
1029  else
1030  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(e.action.removeAura.spell);
1031  }
1032  else
1033  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveAllAuras();
1034 
1035  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_REMOVEAURASFROMSPELL: Unit %s, spell %u",
1036  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.removeAura.spell);
1037  }
1038 
1039  delete targets;
1040  break;
1041  }
1042  case SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW:
1043  {
1044  if (!IsSmart())
1045  break;
1046 
1047  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1048  if (!targets)
1049  {
1050  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StopFollow(false);
1051  break;
1052  }
1053 
1054  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1055  {
1056  if (IsUnit((*itr)))
1057  {
1058  float angle = e.action.follow.angle > 6 ? (e.action.follow.angle * M_PI / 180.0f) : e.action.follow.angle;
1059  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetFollow((*itr)->ToUnit(), float(int32(e.action.follow.dist)) + 0.1f, angle, e.action.follow.credit, e.action.follow.entry, e.action.follow.creditType, e.action.follow.aliveState);
1060  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_FOLLOW: Creature %s following target %s",
1061  me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
1062  break;
1063  }
1064  }
1065 
1066  delete targets;
1067  break;
1068  }
1069  case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE:
1070  {
1071  if (!GetBaseObject())
1072  break;
1073 
1074  uint32 phases[SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT];
1075  phases[0] = e.action.randomPhase.phase1;
1076  phases[1] = e.action.randomPhase.phase2;
1077  phases[2] = e.action.randomPhase.phase3;
1078  phases[3] = e.action.randomPhase.phase4;
1079  phases[4] = e.action.randomPhase.phase5;
1080  phases[5] = e.action.randomPhase.phase6;
1081  uint32 temp[SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT];
1082  uint32 count = 0;
1083  for (uint8 i = 0; i < SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT; i++)
1084  {
1085  if (phases[i] > 0)
1086  {
1087  temp[count] = phases[i];
1088  ++count;
1089  }
1090  }
1091 
1092  if (count == 0)
1093  break;
1094 
1095  uint32 phase = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
1096  SetPhase(phase);
1097  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE: Creature %s sets event phase to %u",
1098  GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), phase);
1099  break;
1100  }
1101  case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE:
1102  {
1103  if (!GetBaseObject())
1104  break;
1105 
1106  uint32 phase = urand(e.action.randomPhaseRange.phaseMin, e.action.randomPhaseRange.phaseMax);
1107  SetPhase(phase);
1108  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_PHASE_RANGE: Creature %s sets event phase to %u",
1109  GetBaseObject()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), phase);
1110  break;
1111  }
1112  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER:
1113  {
1114  if (trigger && IsPlayer(unit))
1115  {
1116  unit->ToPlayer()->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, unit);
1117  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: (trigger == true) Player %s, Killcredit: %u",
1118  unit->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
1119  }
1120  else if (e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_NONE || e.target.type == SMART_TARGET_SELF) // Loot recipient and his group members
1121  {
1122  if (!me)
1123  break;
1124 
1125  if (Player* player = me->GetLootRecipient())
1126  {
1127  player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, player);
1128  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: Player %s, Killcredit: %u",
1129  player->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
1130  }
1131  }
1132  else // Specific target type
1133  {
1134  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1135  if (!targets)
1136  break;
1137 
1138  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1139  {
1140  if (!IsUnit(*itr))
1141  continue;
1142 
1143  Player* player = (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
1144  if (!player)
1145  continue;
1146 
1147  player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(e.action.killedMonster.creature, player);
1148  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_CALL_KILLEDMONSTER: Player %s, Killcredit: %u",
1149  (*itr)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.killedMonster.creature);
1150  }
1151 
1152  delete targets;
1153  }
1154  break;
1155  }
1156  case SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA:
1157  {
1158  WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject();
1159  if (!obj)
1160  obj = unit;
1161 
1162  if (!obj)
1163  break;
1164 
1165  InstanceScript* instance = obj->GetInstanceScript();
1166  if (!instance)
1167  {
1168  LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript: Event %u attempt to set instance data without instance script. EntryOrGuid %d", e.GetEventType(), e.entryOrGuid);
1169  break;
1170  }
1171 
1172  switch (e.action.setInstanceData.type)
1173  {
1174  case 0:
1175  {
1176  instance->SetData(e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data);
1177  LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA: Field: %u, data: %u", e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data);
1178  } break;
1179  case 1:
1180  {
1181  instance->SetBossState(e.action.setInstanceData.field, static_cast<EncounterState>(e.action.setInstanceData.data));
1182  LOG_DEBUG("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA: SetBossState BossId: %u, State: %u (%s)", e.action.setInstanceData.field, e.action.setInstanceData.data, InstanceScript::GetBossStateName(e.action.setInstanceData.data).c_str());
1183  } break;
1184  default:
1185  {
1186  break;
1187  }
1188  }
1189  break;
1190  }
1191  case SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA64:
1192  {
1193  WorldObject* obj = GetBaseObject();
1194  if (!obj)
1195  obj = unit;
1196 
1197  if (!obj)
1198  break;
1199 
1200  InstanceScript* instance = obj->GetInstanceScript();
1201  if (!instance)
1202  {
1203  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Event %u attempt to set instance data without instance script. EntryOrGuid %d", e.GetEventType(), e.entryOrGuid);
1204  break;
1205  }
1206 
1207  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1208  if (!targets)
1209  break;
1210 
1211  instance->SetGuidData(e.action.setInstanceData64.field, targets->front()->GetGUID());
1212  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_INST_DATA64: Field: %u, data: " SI64FMTD,
1213  e.action.setInstanceData64.field, targets->front()->GetGUID().GetRawValue());
1214  delete targets;
1215  break;
1216  }
1217  case SMART_ACTION_UPDATE_TEMPLATE:
1218  {
1219  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1220  if (!targets)
1221  break;
1222 
1223  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1224  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1225  (*itr)->ToCreature()->UpdateEntry(e.action.updateTemplate.creature, nullptr, e.action.updateTemplate.updateLevel != 0);
1226 
1227  delete targets;
1228  break;
1229  }
1230  case SMART_ACTION_DIE:
1231  {
1232  if (me && !me->isDead())
1233  {
1234  Unit::Kill(me, me);
1235  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_DIE: Creature %s", me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
1236  }
1237  break;
1238  }
1239  case SMART_ACTION_SET_IN_COMBAT_WITH_ZONE:
1240  {
1241  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1242  if (!targets)
1243  break;
1244 
1245  if (!me->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
1246  {
1247  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist((float)e.action.combatZone.range);
1248  if (!units->empty() && GetBaseObject())
1249  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = units->begin(); itr != units->end(); ++itr)
1250  if (IsPlayer(*itr) && !(*itr)->ToPlayer()->isDead())
1251  {
1252  me->SetInCombatWith((*itr)->ToPlayer());
1253  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->SetInCombatWith(me);
1254  me->AddThreat((*itr)->ToPlayer(), 0.0f);
1255  }
1256  }
1257  else
1258  {
1259  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1260  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1261  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetInCombatWithZone();
1262  }
1263 
1264  delete targets;
1265  break;
1266  }
1267  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_FOR_HELP:
1268  {
1269  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1270  if (!targets)
1271  break;
1272 
1273  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1274  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1275  {
1276  (*itr)->ToCreature()->CallForHelp((float)e.action.callHelp.range);
1277  if (e.action.callHelp.withEmote)
1278  {
1279  Acore::BroadcastTextBuilder builder(*itr, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE, BROADCAST_TEXT_CALL_FOR_HELP, LANG_UNIVERSAL, nullptr);
1280  sCreatureTextMgr->SendChatPacket(*itr, builder, CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_EMOTE);
1281  }
1282  }
1283 
1284  delete targets;
1285  break;
1286  }
1287  case SMART_ACTION_SET_SHEATH:
1288  {
1289  if (me)
1290  {
1291  me->SetSheath(SheathState(e.action.setSheath.sheath));
1292  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: SMART_ACTION_SET_SHEATH: Creature %s, State: %u",
1293  me->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), e.action.setSheath.sheath);
1294  }
1295  break;
1296  }
1297  case SMART_ACTION_FORCE_DESPAWN:
1298  {
1299  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1300  if (!targets)
1301  break;
1302 
1303  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1304  {
1305  Milliseconds despawnDelay(e.action.forceDespawn.delay);
1306 
1307  // Wait at least one world update tick before despawn, so it doesn't break linked actions.
1308  if (despawnDelay <= 0ms)
1309  {
1310  despawnDelay = 1ms;
1311  }
1312 
1313  Seconds forceRespawnTimer(e.action.forceDespawn.forceRespawnTimer);
1314  if (Creature* creature = (*itr)->ToCreature())
1315  {
1316  creature->DespawnOrUnsummon(despawnDelay, forceRespawnTimer);
1317  }
1318  else if (GameObject* go = (*itr)->ToGameObject())
1319  {
1320  go->DespawnOrUnsummon(despawnDelay, forceRespawnTimer);
1321  }
1322  }
1323 
1324  delete targets;
1325  break;
1326  }
1327  case SMART_ACTION_SET_INGAME_PHASE_MASK:
1328  {
1329  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1330  if (!targets)
1331  break;
1332 
1333  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1334  {
1335  if (IsUnit(*itr))
1336  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetPhaseMask(e.action.ingamePhaseMask.mask, true);
1337  else if (IsGameObject(*itr))
1338  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SetPhaseMask(e.action.ingamePhaseMask.mask, true);
1339  }
1340 
1341  delete targets;
1342  break;
1343  }
1344  case SMART_ACTION_MOUNT_TO_ENTRY_OR_MODEL:
1345  {
1346  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1347  if (!targets)
1348  break;
1349 
1350  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1351  {
1352  if (!IsUnit(*itr))
1353  continue;
1354 
1355  if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature || e.action.morphOrMount.model)
1356  {
1357  if (e.action.morphOrMount.creature > 0)
1358  {
1359  if (CreatureTemplate const* cInfo = sObjectMgr->GetCreatureTemplate(e.action.morphOrMount.creature))
1360  (*itr)->ToUnit()->Mount(ObjectMgr::ChooseDisplayId(cInfo));
1361  }
1362  else
1363  (*itr)->ToUnit()->Mount(e.action.morphOrMount.model);
1364  }
1365  else
1366  (*itr)->ToUnit()->Dismount();
1367  }
1368 
1369  delete targets;
1370  break;
1371  }
1372  case SMART_ACTION_SET_INVINCIBILITY_HP_LEVEL:
1373  {
1374  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1375  if (!targets)
1376  break;
1377 
1378  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1379  {
1380  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1381  {
1382  SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, (*itr)->ToCreature()->AI());
1383  if (!ai)
1384  continue;
1385 
1386  if (e.action.invincHP.percent)
1387  ai->SetInvincibilityHpLevel((*itr)->ToCreature()->CountPctFromMaxHealth(e.action.invincHP.percent));
1388  else
1389  ai->SetInvincibilityHpLevel(e.action.invincHP.minHP);
1390  }
1391  }
1392 
1393  delete targets;
1394  break;
1395  }
1396  case SMART_ACTION_SET_DATA:
1397  {
1398  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1399  if (!targets)
1400  break;
1401 
1402  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1403  {
1404  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1405  (*itr)->ToCreature()->AI()->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data);
1406  else if (IsGameObject(*itr))
1407  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->AI()->SetData(e.action.setData.field, e.action.setData.data);
1408  }
1409 
1410  delete targets;
1411  break;
1412  }
1413  case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_FORWARD:
1414  {
1415  if (!me)
1416  break;
1417 
1418  float x, y, z;
1419  me->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, me->GetObjectSize() / 3, (float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
1420  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(SMART_RANDOM_POINT, x, y, z);
1421  break;
1422  }
1423  case SMART_ACTION_RISE_UP:
1424  {
1425  if (!me)
1426  break;
1427 
1428  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(SMART_RANDOM_POINT, me->GetPositionX(), me->GetPositionY(), me->GetPositionZ() + (float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
1429  break;
1430  }
1431  case SMART_ACTION_SET_VISIBILITY:
1432  {
1433  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1434  if (!targets)
1435  break;
1436 
1437  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1438  if (IsUnit(*itr))
1439  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetVisible(!!e.action.visibility.state);
1440 
1441  delete targets;
1442  break;
1443  }
1444  case SMART_ACTION_SET_ACTIVE:
1445  {
1446  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1447  if (!targets)
1448  break;
1449 
1450  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1451  (*itr)->setActive(!!e.action.setActive.state);
1452 
1453  delete targets;
1454  break;
1455  }
1456  case SMART_ACTION_ATTACK_START:
1457  {
1458  if (!me)
1459  break;
1460 
1461  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1462  if (!targets)
1463  break;
1464 
1465  // xinef: attack random target
1466  if (Unit* target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(*targets)->ToUnit())
1467  me->AI()->AttackStart(target);
1468 
1469  delete targets;
1470  break;
1471  }
1472  case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE:
1473  {
1474  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1475  WorldObject* summoner = GetBaseObject() ? GetBaseObject() : unit;
1476  if (!summoner)
1477  break;
1478 
1479  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
1480  {
1481  float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
1482  Position randomPoint;
1483  Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
1484  for (uint32 i = 0; i < e.target.randomPoint.amount; i++)
1485  {
1486  if (e.target.randomPoint.self > 0)
1487  randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(me->GetPosition(), range);
1488  else
1489  randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
1490  if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, randomPoint, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration))
1491  {
1492  if (unit && e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1493  summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1494  else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1495  summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1496  }
1497  }
1498  break;
1499  }
1500 
1501  if (targets)
1502  {
1503  float x, y, z, o;
1504  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1505  {
1506  (*itr)->GetPosition(x, y, z, o);
1507  x += e.target.x;
1508  y += e.target.y;
1509  z += e.target.z;
1510  o += e.target.o;
1511  if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, x, y, z, o, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration))
1512  {
1513  if (e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker == 2) // pussywizard: proper attackInvoker implementation, but not spoiling tc shitness
1514  summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1515  else if (e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1516  summon->AI()->AttackStart((*itr)->ToUnit());
1517  else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1518  summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1519  }
1520  }
1521 
1522  delete targets;
1523  }
1524 
1525  if (e.GetTargetType() != SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1526  break;
1527 
1528  if (Creature* summon = summoner->SummonCreature(e.action.summonCreature.creature, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o, (TempSummonType)e.action.summonCreature.type, e.action.summonCreature.duration))
1529  {
1530  if (unit && e.action.summonCreature.attackInvoker)
1531  summon->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
1532  else if (me && e.action.summonCreature.attackScriptOwner)
1533  summon->AI()->AttackStart(me);
1534  }
1535  break;
1536  }
1537  case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_GO:
1538  {
1539  if (!GetBaseObject())
1540  break;
1541 
1542  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1543  if (targets)
1544  {
1545  float x, y, z, o;
1546  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1547  {
1548  // xinef: allow gameobjects to summon gameobjects!
1549  //if(!IsUnit((*itr)))
1550  // continue;
1551 
1552  (*itr)->GetPosition(x, y, z, o);
1553  x += e.target.x;
1554  y += e.target.y;
1555  z += e.target.z;
1556  o += e.target.o;
1557  if (!e.action.summonGO.targetsummon)
1558  GetBaseObject()->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, x, y, z, o, 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1559  else
1560  (*itr)->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, GetBaseObject()->GetPositionX(), GetBaseObject()->GetPositionY(), GetBaseObject()->GetPositionZ(), GetBaseObject()->GetOrientation(), 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1561  }
1562 
1563  delete targets;
1564  }
1565 
1566  if (e.GetTargetType() != SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1567  break;
1568 
1569  GetBaseObject()->SummonGameObject(e.action.summonGO.entry, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o, 0, 0, 0, 0, e.action.summonGO.despawnTime);
1570  break;
1571  }
1572  case SMART_ACTION_KILL_UNIT:
1573  {
1574  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1575  if (!targets)
1576  break;
1577 
1578  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1579  {
1580  if (!IsUnit(*itr))
1581  continue;
1582 
1583  Unit::Kill((*itr)->ToUnit(), (*itr)->ToUnit());
1584  }
1585 
1586  delete targets;
1587  break;
1588  }
1589  case SMART_ACTION_INSTALL_AI_TEMPLATE:
1590  {
1591  InstallTemplate(e);
1592  break;
1593  }
1594  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_ITEM:
1595  {
1596  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1597  if (!targets)
1598  break;
1599 
1600  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1601  {
1602  if (!IsPlayer(*itr))
1603  continue;
1604 
1605  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->AddItem(e.action.item.entry, e.action.item.count);
1606  }
1607 
1608  delete targets;
1609  break;
1610  }
1611  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ITEM:
1612  {
1613  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1614  if (!targets)
1615  break;
1616 
1617  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1618  {
1619  if (!IsPlayer(*itr))
1620  continue;
1621 
1622  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(e.action.item.entry, e.action.item.count, true);
1623  }
1624 
1625  delete targets;
1626  break;
1627  }
1628  case SMART_ACTION_STORE_TARGET_LIST:
1629  {
1630  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1631  StoreTargetList(targets, e.action.storeTargets.id);
1632  break;
1633  }
1634  case SMART_ACTION_TELEPORT:
1635  {
1636  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1637  if (!targets)
1638  break;
1639 
1640  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1641  {
1642  if (IsPlayer(*itr))
1643  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->TeleportTo(e.action.teleport.mapID, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
1644  else if (IsUnit(*itr))
1645  (*itr)->ToUnit()->NearTeleportTo(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
1646  }
1647 
1648  delete targets;
1649  break;
1650  }
1651  case SMART_ACTION_SET_FLY:
1652  {
1653  if (!IsSmart())
1654  break;
1655 
1656  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetFly(e.action.setFly.fly);
1657  // Xinef: Set speed if any
1658  if (e.action.setFly.speed)
1659  me->SetSpeed(MOVE_RUN, float(e.action.setFly.speed / 100.0f), true);
1660 
1661  // Xinef: this wil be executed only if state is different
1662  me->SetDisableGravity(e.action.setFly.disableGravity);
1663  break;
1664  }
1665  case SMART_ACTION_SET_RUN:
1666  {
1667  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1668  if (!targets)
1669  break;
1670 
1671  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1672  {
1673  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1674  {
1675  if (IsSmart((*itr)->ToCreature()))
1676  CAST_AI(SmartAI, (*itr)->ToCreature()->AI())->SetRun(e.action.setRun.run);
1677  else
1678  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetWalk(e.action.setRun.run ? false : true); // Xinef: reversed
1679  }
1680  }
1681 
1682  delete targets;
1683  break;
1684  }
1685  case SMART_ACTION_SET_SWIM:
1686  {
1687  if (!IsSmart())
1688  break;
1689 
1690  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetSwim(e.action.setSwim.swim);
1691  break;
1692  }
1693  case SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER:
1694  {
1695  if (ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit))
1696  {
1697  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1698  {
1699  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1700  {
1701  if (SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, (*itr)->ToCreature()->AI()))
1702  ai->GetScript()->StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset);
1703  else
1704  LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER is not using SmartAI, skipping");
1705  }
1706  else if (IsGameObject(*itr))
1707  {
1708  if (SmartGameObjectAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, (*itr)->ToGameObject()->AI()))
1709  ai->GetScript()->StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset);
1710  else
1711  LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SET_COUNTER is not using SmartGameObjectAI, skipping");
1712  }
1713  }
1714 
1715  delete targets;
1716  }
1717  else
1718  StoreCounter(e.action.setCounter.counterId, e.action.setCounter.value, e.action.setCounter.reset);
1719 
1720  break;
1721  }
1722  case SMART_ACTION_WP_START:
1723  {
1724  if (!IsSmart())
1725  break;
1726 
1727  bool run = e.action.wpStart.run;
1728  uint32 entry = e.action.wpStart.pathID;
1729  bool repeat = e.action.wpStart.repeat;
1730 
1731  // Xinef: ensure that SMART_ESCORT_TARGETS contains at least one player reference
1732  bool stored = false;
1733  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1734  if (targets)
1735  {
1736  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1737  {
1738  if (IsPlayer(*itr))
1739  {
1740  stored = true;
1741  StoreTargetList(targets, SMART_ESCORT_TARGETS);
1742  break;
1743  }
1744  }
1745  if (!stored)
1746  delete targets;
1747  }
1748  if (e.action.wpStart.reactState <= REACT_AGGRESSIVE)
1749  {
1750  me->SetReactState((ReactStates) e.action.wpStart.reactState);
1751  }
1752  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StartPath(run, entry, repeat, unit);
1753 
1754  uint32 quest = e.action.wpStart.quest;
1755  uint32 DespawnTime = e.action.wpStart.despawnTime;
1756  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->mEscortQuestID = quest;
1757  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetDespawnTime(DespawnTime);
1758  break;
1759  }
1760  case SMART_ACTION_WP_PAUSE:
1761  {
1762  if (!IsSmart())
1763  break;
1764 
1765  uint32 delay = e.action.wpPause.delay;
1766  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->PausePath(delay, e.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_WAYPOINT_REACHED ? false : true);
1767  break;
1768  }
1769  case SMART_ACTION_WP_STOP:
1770  {
1771  if (!IsSmart())
1772  break;
1773 
1774  uint32 DespawnTime = e.action.wpStop.despawnTime;
1775  uint32 quest = e.action.wpStop.quest;
1776  bool fail = e.action.wpStop.fail;
1777  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->StopPath(DespawnTime, quest, fail);
1778  break;
1779  }
1780  case SMART_ACTION_WP_RESUME:
1781  {
1782  if (!IsSmart())
1783  break;
1784 
1785  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetWPPauseTimer(0);
1786  break;
1787  }
1788  case SMART_ACTION_SET_ORIENTATION:
1789  {
1790  if (!me)
1791  break;
1792 
1793  if (e.action.orientation.random > 0)
1794  {
1795  float randomOri = frand(0.0f, 2 * M_PI);
1796  me->SetFacingTo(randomOri);
1797  if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1798  me->SetOrientation(randomOri);
1799  break;
1800  }
1801 
1802  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF)
1803  {
1804  me->SetFacingTo((me->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT) && me->GetTransGUID() ? me->GetTransportHomePosition() : me->GetHomePosition()).GetOrientation());
1805  if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1806  me->SetOrientation((me->HasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEMENTFLAG_ONTRANSPORT) && me->GetTransGUID() ? me->GetTransportHomePosition() : me->GetHomePosition()).GetOrientation());
1807  }
1808  else if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
1809  {
1810  me->SetFacingTo(e.target.o);
1811  if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1812  me->SetOrientation(e.target.o);
1813  }
1814  else if (ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit))
1815  {
1816  if (!targets->empty())
1817  {
1818  me->SetFacingToObject(*targets->begin());
1819  if (e.action.orientation.quickChange)
1820  me->SetInFront(*targets->begin());
1821  }
1822 
1823  delete targets;
1824  }
1825 
1826  break;
1827  }
1828  case SMART_ACTION_PLAYMOVIE:
1829  {
1830  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1831  if (!targets)
1832  break;
1833 
1834  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1835  {
1836  if (!IsPlayer(*itr))
1837  continue;
1838 
1839  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->SendMovieStart(e.action.movie.entry);
1840  }
1841 
1842  delete targets;
1843  break;
1844  }
1845  case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS:
1846  {
1847  if (!IsSmart())
1848  break;
1849 
1850  WorldObject* target = nullptr;
1851 
1852  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
1853  {
1854  if (me)
1855  {
1856  float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
1857  Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
1858  Position randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
1859  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(
1860  e.action.MoveToPos.pointId,
1861  randomPoint.m_positionX,
1862  randomPoint.m_positionY,
1863  randomPoint.m_positionZ,
1864  true,
1865  true,
1866  isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE
1867  );
1868  }
1869 
1870  break;
1871  }
1872 
1873  /*if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID ||
1874  e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_RANGE ||
1875  e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_GUID || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_GAMEOBJECT_DISTANCE ||
1876  e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_GAMEOBJECT ||
1877  e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_OWNER_OR_SUMMONER || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_ACTION_INVOKER ||
1878  e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_ENEMY || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_FRIENDLY ||
1879  e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_STORED) // Xinef: bieda i rozpierdol TC)*/
1880  {
1881  if (ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit))
1882  {
1883  // xinef: we want to move to random element
1884  target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(*targets);
1885  delete targets;
1886  }
1887  }
1888 
1889  if (!target)
1890  {
1891  G3D::Vector3 dest(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z);
1892  if (e.action.MoveToPos.transport)
1893  if (TransportBase* trans = me->GetDirectTransport())
1894  trans->CalculatePassengerPosition(dest.x, dest.y, dest.z);
1895 
1896  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.MoveToPos.pointId, dest.x, dest.y, dest.z, true, true,
1897  isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE, e.target.o);
1898  }
1899  else // Xinef: we can use dest.x, dest.y, dest.z to make offset
1900  {
1901  float x, y, z;
1902  target->GetPosition(x, y, z);
1903  if (e.action.MoveToPos.ContactDistance > 0)
1904  target->GetContactPoint(me, x, y, z, e.action.MoveToPos.ContactDistance);
1905  me->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.MoveToPos.pointId, x + e.target.x, y + e.target.y, z + e.target.z, true, true, isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
1906  }
1907  break;
1908  }
1909  case SMART_ACTION_MOVE_TO_POS_TARGET:
1910  {
1911  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1912  if (!targets)
1913  return;
1914 
1915  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1916  {
1917  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1918  {
1919  Creature* target = (*itr)->ToCreature();
1920  target->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(e.action.MoveToPos.pointId, e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, true, true, isControlled ? MOTION_SLOT_CONTROLLED : MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
1921  }
1922  }
1923 
1924  delete targets;
1925  break;
1926  }
1927  case SMART_ACTION_RESPAWN_TARGET:
1928  {
1929  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1930  if (!targets)
1931  break;
1932 
1933  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1934  {
1935  if (IsCreature(*itr))
1936  (*itr)->ToCreature()->Respawn(e.action.RespawnTarget.goRespawnTime);
1937  else if (IsGameObject(*itr))
1938  {
1939  // Xinef: do not modify respawndelay of already spawned gameobjects QQ
1940  if ((*itr)->ToGameObject()->isSpawnedByDefault())
1941  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->Respawn();
1942  else
1943  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SetRespawnTime(e.action.RespawnTarget.goRespawnTime);
1944  }
1945  }
1946 
1947  delete targets;
1948  break;
1949  }
1950  case SMART_ACTION_CLOSE_GOSSIP:
1951  {
1952  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1953  if (!targets)
1954  break;
1955 
1956  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1957  if (IsPlayer(*itr))
1958  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->PlayerTalkClass->SendCloseGossip();
1959 
1960  delete targets;
1961  break;
1962  }
1963  case SMART_ACTION_EQUIP:
1964  {
1965  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
1966  if (!targets)
1967  break;
1968 
1969  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
1970  {
1971  if (Creature* npc = (*itr)->ToCreature())
1972  {
1973  uint32 slot[3];
1974  int8 equipId = (int8)e.action.equip.entry;
1975  if (equipId)
1976  {
1977  EquipmentInfo const* einfo = sObjectMgr->GetEquipmentInfo(npc->GetEntry(), equipId);
1978  if (!einfo)
1979  {
1980  LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript: SMART_ACTION_EQUIP uses non-existent equipment info id %u for creature %u", equipId, npc->GetEntry());
1981  break;
1982  }
1983  npc->SetCurrentEquipmentId(equipId);
1984  slot[0] = einfo->ItemEntry[0];
1985  slot[1] = einfo->ItemEntry[1];
1986  slot[2] = einfo->ItemEntry[2];
1987  }
1988  else
1989  {
1990  slot[0] = e.action.equip.slot1;
1991  slot[1] = e.action.equip.slot2;
1992  slot[2] = e.action.equip.slot3;
1993  }
1994  if (!e.action.equip.mask || (e.action.equip.mask & 1))
1995  npc->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + 0, slot[0]);
1996  if (!e.action.equip.mask || (e.action.equip.mask & 2))
1997  npc->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + 1, slot[1]);
1998  if (!e.action.equip.mask || (e.action.equip.mask & 4))
1999  npc->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_ID + 2, slot[2]);
2000  }
2001  }
2002 
2003  delete targets;
2004  break;
2005  }
2006  case SMART_ACTION_CREATE_TIMED_EVENT:
2007  {
2008  SmartEvent ne = SmartEvent();
2009  ne.type = (SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_UPDATE;
2010  ne.event_chance = e.action.timeEvent.chance;
2011  if (!ne.event_chance) ne.event_chance = 100;
2012 
2013  ne.minMaxRepeat.min = e.action.timeEvent.min;
2014  ne.minMaxRepeat.max = e.action.timeEvent.max;
2015  ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin = e.action.timeEvent.repeatMin;
2016  ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax = e.action.timeEvent.repeatMax;
2017 
2018  ne.event_flags = 0;
2019  if (!ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMin && !ne.minMaxRepeat.repeatMax)
2020  ne.event_flags |= SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE;
2021 
2022  SmartAction ac = SmartAction();
2023  ac.type = (SMART_ACTION)SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_TIMED_EVENT;
2024  ac.timeEvent.id = e.action.timeEvent.id;
2025 
2026  SmartScriptHolder ev = SmartScriptHolder();
2027  ev.event = ne;
2028  ev.event_id = e.action.timeEvent.id;
2029  ev.target = e.target;
2030  ev.action = ac;
2031  InitTimer(ev);
2032  mStoredEvents.push_back(ev);
2033  break;
2034  }
2035  case SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_TIMED_EVENT:
2036  ProcessEventsFor((SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED, nullptr, e.action.timeEvent.id);
2037 
2038  // xinef: remove this event if not repeatable
2039  if (e.event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE)
2040  mRemIDs.push_back(e.action.timeEvent.id);
2041  break;
2042  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_TIMED_EVENT:
2043  mRemIDs.push_back(e.action.timeEvent.id);
2044  break;
2045  case SMART_ACTION_OVERRIDE_SCRIPT_BASE_OBJECT:
2046  {
2047  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2048  if (!targets)
2049  break;
2050 
2051  for (ObjectList::iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2052  {
2053  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2054  {
2055  if (!meOrigGUID)
2056  meOrigGUID = me ? me->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2057  if (!goOrigGUID)
2058  goOrigGUID = go ? go->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2059  go = nullptr;
2060  me = (*itr)->ToCreature();
2061  break;
2062  }
2063  else if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2064  {
2065  if (!meOrigGUID)
2066  meOrigGUID = me ? me->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2067  if (!goOrigGUID)
2068  goOrigGUID = go ? go->GetGUID() : ObjectGuid::Empty;
2069  go = (*itr)->ToGameObject();
2070  me = nullptr;
2071  break;
2072  }
2073  }
2074 
2075  delete targets;
2076  break;
2077  }
2078  case SMART_ACTION_RESET_SCRIPT_BASE_OBJECT:
2079  ResetBaseObject();
2080  break;
2081  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_SCRIPT_RESET:
2082  OnReset();
2083  break;
2084  case SMART_ACTION_SET_RANGED_MOVEMENT:
2085  {
2086  if (!IsSmart())
2087  break;
2088 
2089  float attackDistance = float(e.action.setRangedMovement.distance);
2090  float attackAngle = float(e.action.setRangedMovement.angle) / 180.0f * M_PI;
2091 
2092  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2093  if (targets)
2094  {
2095  for (ObjectList::iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2096  if (Creature* target = (*itr)->ToCreature())
2097  if (IsSmart(target) && target->GetVictim())
2098  if (CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->AI())->CanCombatMove())
2099  target->GetMotionMaster()->MoveChase(target->GetVictim(), attackDistance, attackAngle);
2100 
2101  delete targets;
2102  }
2103  break;
2104  }
2105  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
2106  {
2107  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2108  {
2109  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry %d SourceType %u Event %u Action %u is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
2110  break;
2111  }
2112 
2113  if (ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit))
2114  {
2115  for (ObjectList::iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2116  {
2117  if (Creature* target = (*itr)->ToCreature())
2118  {
2119  if (IsSmart(target))
2120  CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->AI())->SetScript9(e, e.action.timedActionList.id, GetLastInvoker());
2121  }
2122  else if (GameObject* goTarget = (*itr)->ToGameObject())
2123  {
2124  if (IsSmartGO(goTarget))
2125  CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, goTarget->AI())->SetScript9(e, e.action.timedActionList.id, GetLastInvoker());
2126  }
2127  }
2128 
2129  delete targets;
2130  }
2131  break;
2132  }
2133  case SMART_ACTION_SET_NPC_FLAG:
2134  {
2135  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2136  if (!targets)
2137  break;
2138 
2139  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2140  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2141  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2142 
2143  delete targets;
2144  break;
2145  }
2146  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_NPC_FLAG:
2147  {
2148  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2149  if (!targets)
2150  break;
2151 
2152  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2153  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2154  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2155 
2156  delete targets;
2157  break;
2158  }
2159  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_NPC_FLAG:
2160  {
2161  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2162  if (!targets)
2163  break;
2164 
2165  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2166  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2167  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2168 
2169  delete targets;
2170  break;
2171  }
2172  case SMART_ACTION_CROSS_CAST:
2173  {
2174  ObjectList* casters = GetTargets(CreateSmartEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, (SMARTAI_TARGETS)e.action.crossCast.targetType, e.action.crossCast.targetParam1, e.action.crossCast.targetParam2, e.action.crossCast.targetParam3, 0, 0), unit);
2175  if (!casters)
2176  break;
2177 
2178  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2179  if (!targets)
2180  {
2181  delete casters; // casters already validated, delete now
2182  break;
2183  }
2184 
2185  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = casters->begin(); itr != casters->end(); ++itr)
2186  {
2187  if (!IsUnit(*itr))
2188  continue;
2189 
2190  bool interruptedSpell = false;
2191 
2192  for (ObjectList::const_iterator it = targets->begin(); it != targets->end(); ++it)
2193  {
2194  if (!IsUnit(*it))
2195  continue;
2196 
2197  if (!(e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !(*it)->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.cast.spell))
2198  {
2199  if (!interruptedSpell && e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
2200  {
2201  (*itr)->ToUnit()->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
2202  interruptedSpell = true;
2203  }
2204 
2205  (*itr)->ToUnit()->CastSpell((*it)->ToUnit(), e.action.cast.spell, (e.action.cast.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED));
2206  }
2207  else
2208  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "Spell %u not casted because it has flag SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT and the target %s already has the aura",
2209  e.action.cast.spell, (*it)->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
2210  }
2211  }
2212 
2213  delete targets;
2214  delete casters;
2215  break;
2216  }
2217  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
2218  {
2219  uint32 actions[SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT];
2220  actions[0] = e.action.randTimedActionList.entry1;
2221  actions[1] = e.action.randTimedActionList.entry2;
2222  actions[2] = e.action.randTimedActionList.entry3;
2223  actions[3] = e.action.randTimedActionList.entry4;
2224  actions[4] = e.action.randTimedActionList.entry5;
2225  actions[5] = e.action.randTimedActionList.entry6;
2226  uint32 temp[SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT];
2227  uint32 count = 0;
2228  for (uint8 i = 0; i < SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT; i++)
2229  {
2230  if (actions[i] > 0)
2231  {
2232  temp[count] = actions[i];
2233  ++count;
2234  }
2235  }
2236 
2237  if (count == 0)
2238  break;
2239 
2240  uint32 id = temp[urand(0, count - 1)];
2241  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2242  {
2243  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry %d SourceType %u Event %u Action %u is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
2244  break;
2245  }
2246 
2247  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2248  if (targets)
2249  {
2250  for (ObjectList::iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2251  {
2252  if (Creature* target = (*itr)->ToCreature())
2253  {
2254  if (IsSmart(target))
2255  CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2256  }
2257  else if (GameObject* goTarget = (*itr)->ToGameObject())
2258  {
2259  if (IsSmartGO(goTarget))
