2260  CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, goTarget->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2261  }
2262  }
2263 
2264  delete targets;
2265  }
2266  break;
2267  }
2268  case SMART_ACTION_CALL_RANDOM_RANGE_TIMED_ACTIONLIST:
2269  {
2270  uint32 id = urand(e.action.randTimedActionList.entry1, e.action.randTimedActionList.entry2);
2271  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
2272  {
2273  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Entry %d SourceType %u Event %u Action %u is using TARGET_NONE(0) for Script9 target. Please correct target_type in database.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.GetEventType(), e.GetActionType());
2274  break;
2275  }
2276 
2277  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2278  if (targets)
2279  {
2280  for (ObjectList::iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2281  {
2282  if (Creature* target = (*itr)->ToCreature())
2283  {
2284  if (IsSmart(target))
2285  CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2286  }
2287  else if (GameObject* goTarget = (*itr)->ToGameObject())
2288  {
2289  if (IsSmartGO(goTarget))
2290  CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, goTarget->AI())->SetScript9(e, id, GetLastInvoker());
2291  }
2292  }
2293 
2294  delete targets;
2295  }
2296  break;
2297  }
2298  case SMART_ACTION_ACTIVATE_TAXI:
2299  {
2300  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2301  if (!targets)
2302  break;
2303 
2304  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2305  if (IsPlayer(*itr))
2306  (*itr)->ToPlayer()->ActivateTaxiPathTo(e.action.taxi.id);
2307 
2308  delete targets;
2309  break;
2310  }
2311  case SMART_ACTION_RANDOM_MOVE:
2312  {
2313  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2314  if (!targets)
2315  break;
2316 
2317  bool foundTarget = false;
2318 
2319  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2320  {
2321  if (IsCreature((*itr)))
2322  {
2323  foundTarget = true;
2324 
2325  if (e.action.moveRandom.distance)
2326  (*itr)->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveRandom((float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
2327  else
2328  (*itr)->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
2329  }
2330  }
2331 
2332  if (!foundTarget && me && IsCreature(me))
2333  {
2334  if (e.action.moveRandom.distance)
2335  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveRandom((float)e.action.moveRandom.distance);
2336  else
2337  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveIdle();
2338  }
2339 
2340  delete targets;
2341  break;
2342  }
2343  case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1:
2344  {
2345  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2346  if (!targets)
2347  break;
2348  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2349  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2350  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, e.action.setunitByte.type, e.action.setunitByte.byte1);
2351 
2352  delete targets;
2353  break;
2354  }
2355  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1:
2356  {
2357  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2358  if (!targets)
2359  break;
2360 
2361  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2362  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2363  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_1, e.action.delunitByte.type, e.action.delunitByte.byte1);
2364 
2365  delete targets;
2366  break;
2367  }
2368  case SMART_ACTION_INTERRUPT_SPELL:
2369  {
2370  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2371  if (!targets)
2372  break;
2373 
2374  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2375  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2376  (*itr)->ToUnit()->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(e.action.interruptSpellCasting.withDelayed, e.action.interruptSpellCasting.spell_id, e.action.interruptSpellCasting.withInstant);
2377 
2378  delete targets;
2379  break;
2380  }
2381  case SMART_ACTION_SEND_GO_CUSTOM_ANIM:
2382  {
2383  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2384  if (!targets)
2385  break;
2386 
2387  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2388  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2389  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SendCustomAnim(e.action.sendGoCustomAnim.anim);
2390 
2391  delete targets;
2392  break;
2393  }
2394  case SMART_ACTION_SET_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
2395  {
2396  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2397  if (!targets)
2398  break;
2399 
2400  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2401  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2402  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2403 
2404  delete targets;
2405  break;
2406  }
2407  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
2408  {
2409  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2410  if (!targets)
2411  break;
2412 
2413  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2414  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2415  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2416 
2417  delete targets;
2418  break;
2419  }
2420  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_DYNAMIC_FLAG:
2421  {
2422  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2423  if (!targets)
2424  break;
2425 
2426  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2427  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2428  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, e.action.unitFlag.flag);
2429 
2430  delete targets;
2431  break;
2432  }
2433  case SMART_ACTION_JUMP_TO_POS:
2434  {
2435  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_RANDOM_POINT)
2436  {
2437  if (me)
2438  {
2439  float range = (float)e.target.randomPoint.range;
2440  Position srcPos = { e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o };
2441  Position randomPoint = me->GetRandomPoint(srcPos, range);
2442  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(randomPoint, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2443  }
2444 
2445  break;
2446  }
2447 
2448  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2449  if (!targets)
2450  break;
2451 
2452  // xinef: my implementation
2453  if (e.action.jump.selfJump)
2454  {
2455  if (WorldObject* target = Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(*targets))
2456  if (me)
2457  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(target->GetPositionX() + e.target.x, target->GetPositionY() + e.target.y, target->GetPositionZ() + e.target.z, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2458  }
2459  else
2460  {
2461  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2462  if (WorldObject* obj = (*itr))
2463  {
2464  if (Creature* creature = obj->ToCreature())
2465  creature->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, (float)e.action.jump.speedxy, (float)e.action.jump.speedz);
2466  }
2467  }
2468 
2469  delete targets;
2470  break;
2471  }
2472  case SMART_ACTION_GO_SET_LOOT_STATE:
2473  {
2474  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2475  if (!targets)
2476  break;
2477 
2478  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2479  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2480  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SetLootState((LootState)e.action.setGoLootState.state);
2481 
2482  delete targets;
2483  break;
2484  }
2485  case SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET:
2486  {
2487  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2488  if (!targets)
2489  break;
2490 
2491  ObjectList* storedTargets = GetTargetList(e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id);
2492  if (!storedTargets)
2493  {
2494  delete targets;
2495  break;
2496  }
2497 
2498  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2499  {
2500  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2501  {
2502  if (SmartAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartAI, (*itr)->ToCreature()->AI()))
2503  ai->GetScript()->StoreTargetList(new ObjectList(*storedTargets), e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id); // store a copy of target list
2504  else
2505  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET is not using SmartAI, skipping");
2506  }
2507  else if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2508  {
2509  if (SmartGameObjectAI* ai = CAST_AI(SmartGameObjectAI, (*itr)->ToGameObject()->AI()))
2510  ai->GetScript()->StoreTargetList(new ObjectList(*storedTargets), e.action.sendTargetToTarget.id); // store a copy of target list
2511  else
2512  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript: Action target for SMART_ACTION_SEND_TARGET_TO_TARGET is not using SmartGameObjectAI, skipping");
2513  }
2514  }
2515 
2516  delete targets;
2517  break;
2518  }
2519  case SMART_ACTION_SEND_GOSSIP_MENU:
2520  {
2521  if (!GetBaseObject())
2522  break;
2523 
2524  LOG_DEBUG("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction:: SMART_ACTION_SEND_GOSSIP_MENU: gossipMenuId %d, gossipNpcTextId %d",
2525  e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId, e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipNpcTextId);
2526  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2527  if (!targets)
2528  break;
2529 
2530  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2531  if (Player* player = (*itr)->ToPlayer())
2532  {
2533  if (e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId)
2534  player->PrepareGossipMenu(GetBaseObject(), e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipMenuId, true);
2535  else
2536  ClearGossipMenuFor(player);
2537 
2538  SendGossipMenuFor(player, e.action.sendGossipMenu.gossipNpcTextId, GetBaseObject()->GetGUID());
2539  }
2540 
2541  delete targets;
2542  break;
2543  }
2544  case SMART_ACTION_SET_HOME_POS:
2545  {
2546  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2547  if (targets)
2548  {
2549  float x, y, z, o;
2550  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2551  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2552  {
2553  if (e.action.setHomePos.spawnPos)
2554  {
2555  (*itr)->ToCreature()->GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
2556  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
2557  }
2558  else
2559  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition((*itr)->GetPositionX(), (*itr)->GetPositionY(), (*itr)->GetPositionZ(), (*itr)->GetOrientation());
2560  }
2561  delete targets;
2562  }
2563  else if (me && e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
2564  {
2565  if (e.action.setHomePos.spawnPos)
2566  {
2567  float x, y, z, o;
2568  me->GetRespawnPosition(x, y, z, &o);
2569  me->SetHomePosition(x, y, z, o);
2570  }
2571  else
2572  me->SetHomePosition(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
2573  }
2574  break;
2575  }
2576  /*{
2577  ObjectList* movers = GetTargets(CreateSmartEvent(SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, SMART_ACTION_NONE, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, (SMARTAI_TARGETS)e.action.sethome.targetType, e.action.sethome.targetParam1, e.action.sethome.targetParam2, e.action.sethome.targetParam3, 0), unit);
2578  if (!movers)
2579  break;
2580 
2581  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_POSITION)
2582  {
2583  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = movers->begin(); itr != movers->end(); ++itr)
2584  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2585  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(e.target.x, e.target.y, e.target.z, e.target.o);
2586  }
2587  else if (ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit))
2588  {
2589  if (WorldObject* target = targets->front())
2590  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = movers->begin(); itr != movers->end(); ++itr)
2591  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2592  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetHomePosition(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ(), target->GetOrientation());
2593 
2594  delete targets;
2595  }
2596 
2597  delete movers;
2598  break;
2599  }*/
2600  case SMART_ACTION_SET_HEALTH_REGEN:
2601  {
2602  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2603  if (!targets)
2604  break;
2605 
2606  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2607  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2608  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetRegeneratingHealth(e.action.setHealthRegen.regenHealth);
2609 
2610  delete targets;
2611  break;
2612  }
2613  case SMART_ACTION_SET_ROOT:
2614  {
2615  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2616  if (!targets)
2617  break;
2618 
2619  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2620  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2621  (*itr)->ToCreature()->SetControlled(e.action.setRoot.root, UNIT_STATE_ROOT);
2622 
2623  delete targets;
2624  break;
2625  }
2626  case SMART_ACTION_SET_GO_FLAG:
2627  {
2628  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2629  if (!targets)
2630  break;
2631 
2632  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2633  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2634  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2635 
2636  delete targets;
2637  break;
2638  }
2639  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_GO_FLAG:
2640  {
2641  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2642  if (!targets)
2643  break;
2644 
2645  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2646  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2647  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SetFlag(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2648 
2649  delete targets;
2650  break;
2651  }
2652  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_GO_FLAG:
2653  {
2654  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2655  if (!targets)
2656  break;
2657 
2658  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2659  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2660  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->RemoveFlag(GAMEOBJECT_FLAGS, e.action.goFlag.flag);
2661 
2662  delete targets;
2663  break;
2664  }
2665  case SMART_ACTION_SUMMON_CREATURE_GROUP:
2666  {
2667  std::list<TempSummon*> summonList;
2668  GetBaseObject()->SummonCreatureGroup(e.action.creatureGroup.group, &summonList);
2669 
2670  for (std::list<TempSummon*>::const_iterator itr = summonList.begin(); itr != summonList.end(); ++itr)
2671  {
2672  if (unit && e.action.creatureGroup.attackInvoker)
2673  (*itr)->AI()->AttackStart(unit);
2674  else if (me && e.action.creatureGroup.attackScriptOwner)
2675  (*itr)->AI()->AttackStart(me);
2676  }
2677 
2678  break;
2679  }
2680  case SMART_ACTION_SET_POWER:
2681  {
2682  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2683 
2684  if (targets)
2685  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2686  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2687  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), e.action.power.newPower);
2688 
2689  delete targets;
2690  break;
2691  }
2692  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_POWER:
2693  {
2694  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2695 
2696  if (targets)
2697  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2698  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2699  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType)) + e.action.power.newPower);
2700 
2701  delete targets;
2702  break;
2703  }
2704  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_POWER:
2705  {
2706  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2707 
2708  if (targets)
2709  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2710  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2711  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType), (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetPower(Powers(e.action.power.powerType)) - e.action.power.newPower);
2712 
2713  delete targets;
2714  break;
2715  }
2716  case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_STOP:
2717  {
2718  uint32 eventId = e.action.gameEventStop.id;
2719  if (!sGameEventMgr->IsActiveEvent(eventId))
2720  {
2721  LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: At case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_STOP, inactive event (id: %u)", eventId);
2722  break;
2723  }
2724  sGameEventMgr->StopEvent(eventId, true);
2725  break;
2726  }
2727  case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_START:
2728  {
2729  uint32 eventId = e.action.gameEventStart.id;
2730  if (sGameEventMgr->IsActiveEvent(eventId))
2731  {
2732  LOG_ERROR("scripts.ai.sai", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: At case SMART_ACTION_GAME_EVENT_START, already activated event (id: %u)", eventId);
2733  break;
2734  }
2735  sGameEventMgr->StartEvent(eventId, true);
2736  break;
2737  }
2738  case SMART_ACTION_START_CLOSEST_WAYPOINT:
2739  {
2740  uint32 waypoints[SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT];
2741  waypoints[0] = e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wp1;
2742  waypoints[1] = e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wp2;
2743  waypoints[2] = e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wp3;
2744  waypoints[3] = e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wp4;
2745  waypoints[4] = e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wp5;
2746  waypoints[5] = e.action.closestWaypointFromList.wp6;
2747  float distanceToClosest = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
2748  WayPoint* closestWp = nullptr;
2749 
2750  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2751  if (targets)
2752  {
2753  for (ObjectList::iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2754  {
2755  if (Creature* target = (*itr)->ToCreature())
2756  {
2757  if (IsSmart(target))
2758  {
2759  for (uint8 i = 0; i < SMART_ACTION_PARAM_COUNT; i++)
2760  {
2761  if (!waypoints[i])
2762  continue;
2763 
2764  WPPath* path = sSmartWaypointMgr->GetPath(waypoints[i]);
2765 
2766  if (!path || path->empty())
2767  continue;
2768 
2769  WPPath::const_iterator itrWp = path->find(0);
2770 
2771  if (itrWp != path->end())
2772  {
2773  if (WayPoint* wp = itrWp->second)
2774  {
2775  float distToThisPath = target->GetDistance(wp->x, wp->y, wp->z);
2776 
2777  if (distToThisPath < distanceToClosest)
2778  {
2779  distanceToClosest = distToThisPath;
2780  closestWp = wp;
2781  }
2782  }
2783  }
2784  }
2785 
2786  if (closestWp)
2787  CAST_AI(SmartAI, target->AI())->StartPath(false, closestWp->id, true);
2788  }
2789  }
2790  }
2791 
2792  delete targets;
2793  }
2794  break;
2795  }
2796  case SMART_ACTION_SET_GO_STATE:
2797  {
2798  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2799  if (!targets)
2800  break;
2801 
2802  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2803  if (IsGameObject(*itr))
2804  (*itr)->ToGameObject()->SetGoState((GOState)e.action.goState.state);
2805 
2806  delete targets;
2807  break;
2808  }
2809  case SMART_ACTION_EXIT_VEHICLE:
2810  {
2811  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2812  if (!targets)
2813  break;
2814 
2815  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2816  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2817  (*itr)->ToUnit()->ExitVehicle();
2818 
2819  delete targets;
2820  break;
2821  }
2822  case SMART_ACTION_SET_UNIT_MOVEMENT_FLAGS:
2823  {
2824  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2825  if (!targets)
2826  break;
2827 
2828  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2829  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2830  {
2831  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetUnitMovementFlags(e.action.movementFlag.flag);
2832  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SendMovementFlagUpdate();
2833  }
2834 
2835  delete targets;
2836  break;
2837  }
2838  case SMART_ACTION_SET_COMBAT_DISTANCE:
2839  {
2840  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2841  if (!targets)
2842  break;
2843 
2844  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2845  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2846  (*itr)->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance = e.action.combatDistance.dist;
2847 
2848  delete targets;
2849  break;
2850  }
2851  case SMART_ACTION_SET_CASTER_COMBAT_DIST:
2852  {
2853  if (e.action.casterDistance.reset)
2854  RestoreCasterMaxDist();
2855  else
2856  SetCasterActualDist(e.action.casterDistance.dist);
2857 
2858  if (me->GetVictim() && me->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() == CHASE_MOTION_TYPE)
2859  me->GetMotionMaster()->MoveChase(me->GetVictim(), GetCasterActualDist());
2860  break;
2861  }
2862  case SMART_ACTION_SET_SIGHT_DIST:
2863  {
2864  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2865  if (!targets)
2866  break;
2867 
2868  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2869  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2870  (*itr)->ToCreature()->m_SightDistance = e.action.sightDistance.dist;
2871 
2872  delete targets;
2873  break;
2874  }
2875  case SMART_ACTION_FLEE:
2876  {
2877  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2878  if (!targets)
2879  break;
2880 
2881  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2882  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2883  (*itr)->ToCreature()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFleeing(me, e.action.flee.withEmote);
2884 
2885  delete targets;
2886  break;
2887  }
2888  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_THREAT:
2889  {
2890  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2891  if (!targets)
2892  break;
2893 
2894  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2895  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2896  me->AddThreat((*itr)->ToUnit(), (float)e.action.threatPCT.threatINC - (float)e.action.threatPCT.threatDEC);
2897 
2898  delete targets;
2899  break;
2900  }
2901  case SMART_ACTION_LOAD_EQUIPMENT:
2902  {
2903  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2904  if (!targets)
2905  break;
2906 
2907  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2908  if (IsCreature(*itr))
2909  (*itr)->ToCreature()->LoadEquipment(e.action.loadEquipment.id, e.action.loadEquipment.force);
2910 
2911  delete targets;
2912  break;
2913  }
2914  case SMART_ACTION_TRIGGER_RANDOM_TIMED_EVENT:
2915  {
2916  uint32 eventId = urand(e.action.randomTimedEvent.minId, e.action.randomTimedEvent.maxId);
2917  ProcessEventsFor((SMART_EVENT)SMART_EVENT_TIMED_EVENT_TRIGGERED, nullptr, eventId);
2918  break;
2919  }
2920  case SMART_ACTION_SET_HOVER:
2921  {
2922  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2923  if (!targets)
2924  break;
2925 
2926  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2927  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2928  (*itr)->ToUnit()->SetHover(e.action.setHover.state);
2929 
2930  delete targets;
2931  break;
2932  }
2933  case SMART_ACTION_ADD_IMMUNITY:
2934  {
2935  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2936  if (!targets)
2937  break;
2938 
2939  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2940  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2941  (*itr)->ToUnit()->ApplySpellImmune(e.action.immunity.id, e.action.immunity.type, e.action.immunity.value, true);
2942 
2943  delete targets;
2944  break;
2945  }
2946  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_IMMUNITY:
2947  {
2948  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2949  if (!targets)
2950  break;
2951 
2952  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2953  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2954  (*itr)->ToUnit()->ApplySpellImmune(e.action.immunity.id, e.action.immunity.type, e.action.immunity.value, false);
2955 
2956  delete targets;
2957  break;
2958  }
2959  case SMART_ACTION_FALL:
2960  {
2961  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2962  if (!targets)
2963  break;
2964 
2965  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2966  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2967  (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFall();
2968 
2969  delete targets;
2970  break;
2971  }
2972  case SMART_ACTION_SET_EVENT_FLAG_RESET:
2973  {
2974  SetPhaseReset(e.action.setActive.state);
2975  break;
2976  }
2977  case SMART_ACTION_REMOVE_ALL_GAMEOBJECTS:
2978  {
2979  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2980  if (!targets)
2981  break;
2982 
2983  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2984  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2985  (*itr)->ToUnit()->RemoveAllGameObjects();
2986 
2987  delete targets;
2988  break;
2989  }
2990  case SMART_ACTION_STOP_MOTION:
2991  {
2992  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
2993  if (!targets)
2994  break;
2995 
2996  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
2997  if (IsUnit(*itr))
2998  {
2999  if (e.action.stopMotion.stopMovement)
3000  (*itr)->ToUnit()->StopMoving();
3001  if (e.action.stopMotion.movementExpired)
3002  (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetMotionMaster()->MovementExpired();
3003  }
3004 
3005  delete targets;
3006  break;
3007  }
3008  case SMART_ACTION_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPDATE:
3009  {
3010  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
3011  if (!targets)
3012  break;
3013 
3014  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
3015  if (IsUnit(*itr))
3016  (*itr)->ToUnit()->AddUnitState(UNIT_STATE_NO_ENVIRONMENT_UPD);
3017 
3018  delete targets;
3019  break;
3020  }
3021  case SMART_ACTION_ZONE_UNDER_ATTACK:
3022  {
3023  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
3024  if (!targets)
3025  break;
3026 
3027  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
3028  if (IsUnit(*itr))
3029  if (Player* player = (*itr)->ToUnit()->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself())
3030  {
3031  me->SendZoneUnderAttackMessage(player);
3032  break;
3033  }
3034 
3035  delete targets;
3036  break;
3037  }
3038  case SMART_ACTION_LOAD_GRID:
3039  {
3040  if (me && me->FindMap())
3041  me->FindMap()->LoadGrid(e.target.x, e.target.y);
3042  break;
3043  }
3044  case SMART_ACTION_PLAYER_TALK:
3045  {
3046  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
3047  char const* text = sObjectMgr->GetAcoreString(e.action.playerTalk.textId, DEFAULT_LOCALE);
3048 
3049  if (targets)
3050  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
3051  if (IsPlayer(*itr))
3052  !e.action.playerTalk.flag ? (*itr)->ToPlayer()->Say(text, LANG_UNIVERSAL) : (*itr)->ToPlayer()->Yell(text, LANG_UNIVERSAL);
3053 
3054  delete targets;
3055  break;
3056  }
3057  case SMART_ACTION_CUSTOM_CAST:
3058  {
3059  if (!me)
3060  break;
3061 
3062  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
3063  if (!targets)
3064  break;
3065 
3066  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
3067  {
3068  if (IsUnit(*itr))
3069  {
3070  if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_INTERRUPT_PREVIOUS)
3071  me->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
3072 
3073  if (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE)
3074  {
3075  // If cast flag SMARTCAST_COMBAT_MOVE is set combat movement will not be allowed
3076  // unless target is outside spell range, out of mana, or LOS.
3077 
3078  bool _allowMove = false;
3079  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(e.action.castCustom.spell); // AssertSpellInfo?
3080  int32 mana = me->GetPower(POWER_MANA);
3081 
3082  if (me->GetDistance((*itr)->ToUnit()) > spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true) ||
3083  me->GetDistance((*itr)->ToUnit()) < spellInfo->GetMinRange(true) ||
3084  !me->IsWithinLOSInMap((*itr)->ToUnit()) ||
3085  mana < spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(me, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()))
3086  _allowMove = true;
3087 
3088  CAST_AI(SmartAI, me->AI())->SetCombatMove(_allowMove);
3089  }
3090 
3091  if (!(e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_AURA_NOT_PRESENT) || !(*itr)->ToUnit()->HasAura(e.action.castCustom.spell))
3092  {
3093  CustomSpellValues values;
3094  if (e.action.castCustom.bp1)
3095  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, e.action.castCustom.bp1);
3096  if (e.action.castCustom.bp2)
3097  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, e.action.castCustom.bp2);
3098  if (e.action.castCustom.bp3)
3099  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2, e.action.castCustom.bp3);
3100  me->CastCustomSpell(e.action.castCustom.spell, values, (*itr)->ToUnit(), (e.action.castCustom.flags & SMARTCAST_TRIGGERED) ? TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK : TRIGGERED_NONE);
3101  }
3102  }
3103  }
3104  delete targets;
3105  break;
3106  }
3107  case SMART_ACTION_VORTEX_SUMMON:
3108  {
3109  if (!me)
3110  break;
3111 
3112  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
3113  if (!targets)
3114  break;
3115 
3116  TempSummonType summon_type = (e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
3117 
3118  float a = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.a);
3119  float k = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.k) / 1000.0f;
3120  float r_max = static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.r_max);
3121  float delta_phi = M_PI * static_cast<float>(e.action.summonVortex.phi_delta) / 180.0f;
3122 
3123  // r(phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi)
3124  // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * (phi + delta_phi))
3125  // r(phi + delta_phi) = a * e ^ (k * phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
3126  // r(phi + delta_phi) = r(phi) * e ^ (k * delta_phi)
3127  float factor = std::exp(k * delta_phi);
3128 
3129  // r(0) = a * e ^ (k * 0) = a * e ^ 0 = a * 1 = a
3130  float summonRadius = a;
3131 
3132  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
3133  {
3134  // Offset by orientation, should not count into radius calculation,
3135  // but is needed for vortex direction (polar coordinates)
3136  float phi = (*itr)->GetOrientation();
3137 
3138  do
3139  {
3140  Position summonPosition(**itr);
3141  summonPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(phi, summonRadius);
3142 
3143  me->SummonCreature(e.action.summonVortex.summonEntry, summonPosition, summon_type, e.action.summonVortex.summonDuration);
3144 
3145  phi += delta_phi;
3146  summonRadius *= factor;
3147  } while (summonRadius <= r_max);
3148  }
3149 
3150  delete targets;
3151  break;
3152  }
3153  case SMART_ACTION_CONE_SUMMON:
3154  {
3155  if (!me)
3156  break;
3157 
3158  TempSummonType spawnType = (e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration > 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_CORPSE_DESPAWN;
3159 
3160  float distInARow = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenSummons);
3161  float coneAngle = static_cast<float>(e.action.coneSummon.coneAngle) * M_PI / 180.0f;
3162 
3163  for (uint32 radius = 0; radius <= e.action.coneSummon.coneLength; radius += e.action.coneSummon.distanceBetweenRings)
3164  {
3165  float deltaAngle = 0.0f;
3166  if (radius > 0)
3167  deltaAngle = distInARow / radius;
3168 
3169  uint32 count = 1;
3170  if (deltaAngle > 0)
3171  count += coneAngle / deltaAngle;
3172 
3173  float currentAngle = -static_cast<float>(count) * deltaAngle / 2.0f;
3174 
3175  if (e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_SELF || e.GetTargetType() == SMART_TARGET_NONE)
3176  currentAngle += G3D::fuzzyGt(e.target.o, 0.0f) ? (e.target.o - me->GetOrientation()) : 0.0f;
3177  else if (ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit))
3178  {
3179  currentAngle += (me->GetAngle(targets->front()) - me->GetOrientation());
3180  delete targets;
3181  }
3182 
3183  for (uint32 index = 0; index < count; ++index)
3184  {
3185  Position spawnPosition(*me);
3186  spawnPosition.RelocatePolarOffset(currentAngle, radius);
3187  currentAngle += deltaAngle;
3188 
3189  me->SummonCreature(e.action.coneSummon.summonEntry, spawnPosition, spawnType, e.action.coneSummon.summonDuration);
3190  }
3191  }
3192 
3193  break;
3194  }
3195  case SMART_ACTION_CU_ENCOUNTER_START:
3196  {
3197  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
3198  if (!targets)
3199  break;
3200 
3201  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = targets->begin(); itr != targets->end(); ++itr)
3202  {
3203  if (Player* playerTarget = (*itr)->ToPlayer())
3204  {
3205  playerTarget->RemoveArenaSpellCooldowns();
3206  playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57724); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Sated (Heroism)
3207  playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(57723); // Spell Shaman Debuff - Exhaustion (Bloodlust)
3208  playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(2825); // Bloodlust
3209  playerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(32182); // Heroism
3210  }
3211  }
3212 
3213  delete targets;
3214  break;
3215  }
3216  case SMART_ACTION_DO_ACTION:
3217  {
3218  int32 const actionId = e.action.doAction.isNegative ? -e.action.doAction.actionId : e.action.doAction.actionId;
3219  if (!e.action.doAction.instanceTarget)
3220  {
3221  ObjectList* targets = GetTargets(e, unit);
3222  if (!targets)
3223  {
3224  break;
3225  }
3226 
3227  for (WorldObject* objTarget : *targets)
3228  {
3229  if (Creature const* unitTarget = objTarget->ToCreature())
3230  {
3231  if (unitTarget->IsAIEnabled)
3232  {
3233  unitTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
3234  }
3235  }
3236  else if (GameObject const* gobjTarget = objTarget->ToGameObject())
3237  {
3238  gobjTarget->AI()->DoAction(actionId);
3239  }
3240  }
3241 
3242  delete targets;
3243  }
3244  else
3245  {
3246  InstanceScript* instanceScript = nullptr;
3247  if (WorldObject* baseObj = GetBaseObject())
3248  {
3249  instanceScript = baseObj->GetInstanceScript();
3250  }
3251  // Action is triggered by AreaTrigger
3252  else if (trigger && IsPlayer(unit))
3253  {
3254  instanceScript = unit->GetInstanceScript();
3255  }
3256 
3257  if (instanceScript)
3258  {
3259  instanceScript->DoAction(actionId);
3260  }
3261  }
3262  break;
3263  }
3264  default:
3265  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry %d SourceType %u, Event %u, Unhandled Action type %u", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.GetActionType());
3266  break;
3267  }
3268 
3269  if (e.link && e.link != e.event_id)
3270  {
3271  SmartScriptHolder linked = FindLinkedEvent(e.link);
3272  if (linked.GetActionType() && linked.GetEventType() == SMART_EVENT_LINK)
3273  ProcessEvent(linked, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);
3274  else
3275  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessAction: Entry %d SourceType %u, Event %u, Link Event %u not found or invalid, skipped.", e.entryOrGuid, e.GetScriptType(), e.event_id, e.link);
3276  }
3277 }
npc
npc

3855  return;
3856

3868  break;

3885  return;

4292  return;
4293  ProcessAction(e, unit, var0, var1);
4294  break;
4295  }
4296  case SMART_EVENT_GO_EVENT_INFORM:
4297  {
4298  if (e.event.eventInform.eventId != var0)
4299  return;
4300  ProcessAction(e, nullptr, var0);
4301  break;
4302  }
4303  case SMART_EVENT_ACTION_DONE:
4304  {
4305  if (e.event.doAction.eventId != var0)
4306  return;
4307  ProcessAction(e, unit, var0);
4308  break;
4309  }
4310  case SMART_EVENT_FRIENDLY_HEALTH_PCT:
4311  {
4312  if (!me || !me->IsInCombat())
4313  return;
4314 
4315  ObjectList* _targets = nullptr;
4316 
4317  switch (e.GetTargetType())
4318  {
4319  case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_RANGE:
4320  case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_GUID:
4321  case SMART_TARGET_CREATURE_DISTANCE:
4322  case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_CREATURE:
4323  case SMART_TARGET_CLOSEST_PLAYER:
4324  case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_RANGE:
4325  case SMART_TARGET_PLAYER_DISTANCE:
4326  _targets = GetTargets(e);
4327  break;
4328  default:
4329  return;
4330  }
4331 
4332  if (!_targets)
4333  return;
4334 
4335  Unit* target = nullptr;
4336 
4337  for (ObjectList::const_iterator itr = _targets->begin(); itr != _targets->end(); ++itr)
4338  {
4339  if (IsUnit(*itr) && me->IsFriendlyTo((*itr)->ToUnit()) && (*itr)->ToUnit()->IsAlive() && (*itr)->ToUnit()->IsInCombat())
4340  {
4341  uint32 healthPct = uint32((*itr)->ToUnit()->GetHealthPct());
4342 
4343  if (healthPct > e.event.friendlyHealthPct.maxHpPct || healthPct < e.event.friendlyHealthPct.minHpPct)
4344  continue;
4345 
4346  target = (*itr)->ToUnit();
4347  break;
4348  }
4349  }
4350 
4351  delete _targets;
4352 
4353  if (!target)
4354  return;
4355 
4356  ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMin, e.event.friendlyHealthPct.repeatMax, target);
4357  break;
4358  }
4359  case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_CREATURE:
4360  {
4361  if (!me)
4362  return;
4363 
4364  WorldObject* creature = nullptr;
4365 
4366  if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
4367  {
4368  creature = FindCreatureNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
4369 
4370  if (!creature)
4371  return;
4372 
4373  if (!me->IsInRange(creature, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
4374  return;
4375  }
4376  else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
4377  {
4378  std::list<Creature*> list;
4379  me->GetCreatureListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
4380 
4381  if (!list.empty())
4382  creature = list.front();
4383  }
4384 
4385  if (creature)
4386  ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
4387 
4388  break;
4389  }
4390  case SMART_EVENT_DISTANCE_GAMEOBJECT:
4391  {
4392  if (!me)
4393  return;
4394 
4395  WorldObject* gameobject = nullptr;
4396 
4397  if (e.event.distance.guid != 0)
4398  {
4399  gameobject = FindGameObjectNear(me, e.event.distance.guid);
4400 
4401  if (!gameobject)
4402  return;
4403 
4404  if (!me->IsInRange(gameobject, 0, (float)e.event.distance.dist))
4405  return;
4406  }
4407  else if (e.event.distance.entry != 0)
4408  {
4409  std::list<GameObject*> list;
4410  me->GetGameObjectListWithEntryInGrid(list, e.event.distance.entry, (float)e.event.distance.dist);
4411 
4412  if (!list.empty())
4413  gameobject = list.front();
4414  }
4415 
4416  if (gameobject)
4417  ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.distance.repeat, e.event.distance.repeat);
4418 
4419  break;
4420  }
4421  case SMART_EVENT_COUNTER_SET:
4422  if (e.event.counter.id != var0 || GetCounterValue(e.event.counter.id) != e.event.counter.value)
4423  return;
4424 
4425  ProcessTimedAction(e, e.event.counter.cooldownMin, e.event.counter.cooldownMax);
4426  break;
4427  case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS:
4428  {
4429  float range = (float)e.event.nearPlayer.radius;
4430  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist(range);
4431  if (!units->empty())
4432  {
4433  units->remove_if([](WorldObject * unit) { return unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER; });
4434 
4435  if (units->size() >= e.event.nearPlayer.minCount)
4436  ProcessAction(e, unit);
4437  }
4438  RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayer.checkTimer, e.event.nearPlayer.checkTimer);
4439  break;
4440  }
4441  case SMART_EVENT_NEAR_PLAYERS_NEGATION:
4442  {
4443  float range = (float)e.event.nearPlayerNegation.radius;
4444  ObjectList* units = GetWorldObjectsInDist(range);
4445  if (!units->empty())
4446  {
4447  units->remove_if([](WorldObject * unit) { return unit->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER; });
4448 
4449  if (units->size() < e.event.nearPlayerNegation.minCount)
4450  ProcessAction(e, unit);
4451  }
4452  RecalcTimer(e, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.checkTimer, e.event.nearPlayerNegation.checkTimer);
4453  break;
4454  }
4455  default:
4456  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "SmartScript::ProcessEvent: Unhandled Event type %u", e.GetEventType());
4457  break;
4458  }
4459 }

101 {
102  for (SmartAIEventList::iterator i = mEvents.begin(); i != mEvents.end(); ++i)
103  {
104  SMART_EVENT eventType = SMART_EVENT((*i).GetEventType());
105  if (eventType == SMART_EVENT_LINK)//special handling
106  continue;
107 
108  if (eventType == e/* && (!(*i).event.event_phase_mask || IsInPhase((*i).event.event_phase_mask)) && !((*i).event.event_flags & SMART_EVENT_FLAG_NOT_REPEATABLE && (*i).runOnce)*/)
109  {
110  ConditionList conds = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForSmartEvent((*i).entryOrGuid, (*i).event_id, (*i).source_type);
111  ConditionSourceInfo info = ConditionSourceInfo(unit, GetBaseObject(), me ? me->GetVictim() : nullptr);
112 
113  if (sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions(info, conds))
114  ProcessEvent(*i, unit, var0, var1, bvar, spell, gob);

116  }

4508  return;

4511  {
4512  // delay spell cast event if another spell is being casted

4514  {
